Coupon: Apply 5% coupon Shop items | Terms Size: 5 Drawers 3 Drawers 4 Drawers 5 Drawers Color: White Purchase options and add-ons Brand Furnulem Product Dimensions 11.5"D x 16.1"W x 43.3"H Color White Room Type Living Room, Bedroom, Home Office, Nursery, Hallway Special Feature Sturdy Material Alloy Steel Finish Type Rustic Number of Drawers 5 Style Vintage About this item 【Multi-scene Application】This dresser is designed in a modern concise style, which is attractive and functional, making it suitable for any room. It can be a storage dresser in the bedroom or a side table in the living room, also great for closets, nurseries, entryways, hallways, offices, playrooms, children's room and more. 【Double Display Shelf】Specially designed with the double-layer shelf. The wooden top is solid and wear-resistant. It can display vases, photo frames, lamps, decorations, etc. Or it can be used to place glasses, alarm clocks, books, chargers and other sundries, which is not only convenient and practical but also artistic as a decor. 【Durable Storage Drawer】Features foldable storage drawers. Each fabric drawer (NOT WOOD) offers large storage space, perfect for organizing clothes, toys, socks, underwear, scarves, blankets and other accessories. The drawers are made of PVC fabric, lightweight and durable, and won't pinch hands, also safe for child to use. 【Sturdy Structure】The chest of drawer is made with sturdy metal frame, and its back is equiped with more reinforced X-type crossbar, which offers high strength support and ensure years of use. It weighs only 17 pounds, isn’t bulky and easy to move. Anti-toppling device is provided to prevent it from falling down. Fully guaranteed stability and safety. 【Easy to Assemble】The package includes all the tools and accessories, you can install it in 20 minutes with the instruction. The wood dresser is slim and light, and does not take up much space. Perfect Gift for a housewarming or your family and friends. Forestry practices Made with materials from well-managed forests, recycled materials, and/or other controlled wood sources. As certified by The Forest Stewardship Council The Forest Stewardship Council The Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) supports responsible forestry, which is a vital solution to combat climate change. Choosing FSC-certified products –  whether furniture, building materials, paper, rubber, or textiles – helps protect forests, wildlife, clean water and supports the Indigenous Peoples, forest workers and communities who depend on them. Choosing FSC-certified  products can also help to mitigate climate change by supporting responsible management of the world’s forests. For a better  future, choose FSC. To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. Read more View Image Gallery Amazon Customer 5.0 out of 5 stars Images in this review Reviews with images See all photos Previous page Next page All photos Amazon Customer 4 out of 5 stars Pretty good find I was looking for something I could use for storage, yet also have a place to display photos, trinkets,etc. like you would on a desk top. Glad to say I found this one as I perfectly suited my needs. That being said, there were a few things to note- the first being that shipping was delayed not once but twice. Both times I was not notified of a delay until the day of the supposed arrival. So getting this much later than expected was a little disappointing to say the least. Secondly, the instructions did not provide details on how to attach the reinforcement bars at the back at all. Other than that, it was easy enough to put together on my own(a 19yr old with minimal experience), was pretty sturdy considering the price, drawers were functional, and it fit perfectly where I wanted it. It wasn’t too heavy to move on my own either. My kitten approves as well, as he actively inserted himself in the lowest drawer to check things out lol. Each tier can hold 3-4 pairs of shoes, with a height of 4.6" from the floor to the bottom, creating an extra space you can use it for slippers. 【STACKABLE】The bamboo shelf has a very practical splicing feature, each main pole has grooves at both ends and is connected by bamboo tips, when you have multiple shoe racks, you can stack the layers upwards to add more storage space for you. 【INSTALLATION AND SERVICE】The shoe shelf package has all the installation tools and accessories ready for you, just less than 10 minutes, you are done with the assembly. Simple and Natural Style Carefully selected materials The shoe stand is made of old alpine bamboo, combined with new high-temperature carbonization technology, which is effectively waterproof and sturdy, allowing you to use them for a longer period of time. Unique stackable design Shoe organizer have a very practical stitching function with multiple layers of storage. When you have multiple shoe racks, you can stack them upwards to add more storage space for your living needs. Shoe Rack Organizer - Increase Storage Space Too many shoes in the family, not easy to find? This shoe rack is designed close to life, they are just a simple bamboo shelf, but they can help us solve those inevitable storage troubles in our daily life. Multi-level increase storage space, can be placed in the closet, living room, balcony, entryway, so that your shoes, bags, clothes, towels, small potted plants are well organized. Clearly textured bamboo Preserve the bamboo texture and increase the density of bamboo slats to make it more load-bearing. Metal link Rust-proof metal hinge, stable and durable, no need to worry about it breaking. Easy to install All the installation accessories are prepared for you in the shoe rack package, simple and convenient. Easy Stacking When you want a more tiered shoe rack, all you need is a wooden tip link to stack upwards. To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. Read more View Image Gallery Amazon Customer 5.0 out of 5 stars Images in this review Reviews with images See all photos Previous page Next page All photos Amazon Customer 5 out of 5 stars A very lightweight show rack We have a lot of shoes, and need lots of shoe racks.  We have used the same type of shoe rack for years, so we thought we would try out this Z&L HOUSE 4-Tier stackable Shoe Rack for our closet.All the parts were there, and everything fit together well.  Our only complaint is that is it somewhat flimsy.  It is made from bamboo, which is what we wanted, but since it does not have a stabilizing bar in the center, the shelves sag in the middle if you put any weight on it at all.  Plus, shoe boxes, or larger size shoes, will stick out the front by an inch or two.  I attached a picture to show this.So….if you are only going to put smaller, flatter walking shoes without boxes on this rack you are all good.  If you have bigger shoes, golf shoes, or high top sneakers you might not want this.  But for the money, this is a nice shoe rack.Recommended. Island Gal 5.0 out of 5 stars A very lightweight show rack Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2024 Verified Purchase We have a lot of shoes, and need lots of shoe racks.  We have used the same type of shoe rack for years, so we thought we would try out this Z&L HOUSE 4-Tier stackable Shoe Rack for our closet. All the parts were there, and everything fit together well.  Our only complaint is that is it somewhat flimsy.  It is made from bamboo, which is what we wanted, but since it does not have a stabilizing bar in the center, the shelves sag in the middle if you put any weight on it at all.  Plus, shoe boxes, or larger size shoes, will stick out the front by an inch or two.  I attached a picture to show this. So….if you are only going to put smaller, flatter walking shoes without boxes on this rack you are all good.  If you have bigger shoes, golf shoes, or high top sneakers you might not want this.  But for the money, this is a nice shoe rack. Recommended. Read more Island Gal 5.0 out of 5 stars A very lightweight show rack Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2024 We have a lot of shoes, and need lots of shoe racks.  We have used the same type of shoe rack for years, so we thought we would try out this Z&L HOUSE 4-Tier stackable Shoe Rack for our closet. All the parts were there, and everything fit together well.  Our only complaint is that is it somewhat flimsy.  It is made from bamboo, which is what we wanted, but since it does not have a stabilizing bar in the center, the shelves sag in the middle if you put any weight on it at all.  Plus, shoe boxes, or larger size shoes, will stick out the front by an inch or two.  I attached a picture to show this. So….if you are only going to put smaller, flatter walking shoes without boxes on this rack you are all good.  If you have bigger shoes, golf shoes, or high top sneakers you might not want this.  But for the money, this is a nice shoe rack. Recommended. Images in this review Helpful Report Catherine 5.0 out of 5 stars Maximize Your Space: Z&L HOUSE 3-Tier Bamboo Shoe Rack - A Stylish & Versatile Organizer! Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2024 Color: 3-tier Verified Purchase I purchased the Z&L HOUSE 3-Tier Shoe Rack for my entryway, and it has completely transformed my space management and organization. This shoe rack, highlighted as Amazon's Choice, not only met but exceeded my expectations with its functionality and aesthetic appeal. First off, the assembly of this bamboo shoe rack was straightforward and took minimal time, a relief for someone who's not particularly handy. The instructions were clear, and all necessary components fit together seamlessly. Once assembled, the rack felt sturdy and stable, a testament to its quality construction. The bamboo material is not only sustainable and eco-friendly but also adds a warm, natural touch to my home decor. Its design is sleek and minimalist, making it a versatile addition that blends well with various interior styles, from modern to rustic. Functionality-wise, the Z&L HOUSE 3-Tier Shoe Rack shines with its capacity and versatility. It comfortably holds up to 9 pairs of shoes, from sneakers to high heels, keeping them organized and easily accessible. The open design ensures that shoes air out properly, which is particularly beneficial in preventing odor buildup in the entryway or closet. One of the standout features of this shoe rack is its stackability. The design allows for easy stacking of another unit on top, offering a customizable solution that grows with your needs. This flexibility to expand is perfect for anyone who loves shoes and needs more space in the future. Moreover, the multifunctional aspect of this rack cannot be overstated. Beyond shoes, it serves as a handy shelf for storing various items such as bags, boxes, or even plants, making it a multi-purpose addition to any room. In conclusion, the Z&L HOUSE 3-Tier Bamboo Shoe Rack is a must-have for anyone looking to enhance their shoe storage solution. It offers an excellent balance of style, durability, and versatility, making it a valuable investment for keeping your entryway, closet, or hallway clutter-free and organized. Highly recommended for its practicality and chic design. Until its dreams come true, I’m hoping it will continue holding my shoes and not cave in like a dying star. Also, Chihuahua for scale. His name is Riley and he’s very old but even he respects the shoe rack. Be like Riley, shoe some respect. TL:DR: I kind of like it for its basic design, annoying to build and horrendous quality. I’d recommend it for someone who wants a shoe rack but can’t justify spending $30+ on Amazon anymore. It’s awful but I’ve come to love its simplicity. Read more View Image Gallery Amazon Customer 5.0 out of 5 stars Images in this review Reviews with images See all photos Previous page Next page All photos Amazon Customer 5 out of 5 stars Nice portable standing desk! I will start by saying that I do have a large electric/motorized standing desk at my home office which I enjoy and you really can’t beat the convenience of adjusting automatically. However, I went on vacation and had to do some school work so I was looking for something affordable. I found this gem and purchased it with really no expectations. I was pleasantly surprised at its stability. I am very tall and at the highest height works well for standing and it fit my needs. The manual adjustment takes some getting used to but I figured that out. The weight of the box was not that heavy and it was easy to put together in under 20 mins. Appearance wise, the table top is sleek and has ample width for me to be able to fit my laptop and my portable monitor with room for a few books.  I drove so of course I decided to take this home with me and it will be coming with me for future road trips. I recently had emergency surgery and of course this is helping me during my recovery to keep up with my work as you can see from the picture. I’m glad I purchased this. If you aren’t able to splurge on a motorized desk, this is awesome and I am glad I now have the convenience of changing my work space and not confined to my basement all day lol! Lott 3.0 out of 5 stars Not Easily Adjustable Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2024 Color: Rustic Verified Purchase Positives: --Color of the desktop --Desktop has a good amount of space, but small enough to easily tuck the table in a corner --Assembly was fairly straightforward, I figured it out --If you wanted to use it with a walking pad, it feels sturdy and probably wide enough Negatives (sorry y'all): --I figured assembly out but the instructions could have been more clear. It was a lot of tiny diagrams and arrows. --Height is adjusted by removing/inserting two very LONG screw-in knobs. You'll be screwing/unscrewing until the end of time! There are two other shorter knobs facing outward from the front of the desk. I have no idea what these are for - they do not help with height adjustment. I thought that I had used the incorrect knobs but the shorter knobs don't fit in the holes on the side of the desk. --For when you're in a seated position: there is a bar connecting the legs together underneath the table. I am unable to sit completely underneath it (with the desk touching my torso) without bumping my legs on the bar. I'm not a tall person - 5'3" / 160.02 cm. To be fair, the product description gave measurements/photos and it's intended to be more of a standing desk anyway. If you're looking for a desk that easily adjusts between standing/sitting, this may not be the one for you. If you want to use it only in the standing position, go for it! To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. Read more View Image Gallery Amazon Customer 5.0 out of 5 stars Images in this review Reviews with images See all photos Previous page Next page All photos Amazon Customer 4 out of 5 stars Great Quality Mirrors for Home Gym Setup I purchased the Delma Wall Mirror Full Length set for exercising in my basement. I wanted to ensure I could watch myself to avoid injuries due to poor posture or positioning. The mirrors seem like good quality with no visible defects, and I was able to line them up straight and even on the wall. However, the directions for installation are pretty vague, and there is definitely not enough glue included, so plan to buy some more! I also suggest using a laser level to ensure the pieces line up evenly on your wall before gluing them down. Four mirrors at the 16x12 inch size don’t provide a nice full body view, so I had to purchase two sets. Overall, they are a good addition to my home gym. Images in this review Helpful Report Katherine & Mick 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Mirror Tiles Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2024 Size: 14''x12''-4PCS Verified Purchase I bought this for my eleven year old daughter's room -- for the back of the door.  Was difficult to find those types of mirrors locally.  On Amazon, full length mirrors were fairly pricey most likely due to the shipping size.  I stumbled upon these in my search and after reading the reviews decided they should work well. They do work well.  The tiles come well packaged in separate tiles which you can "assemble" in way you want.  I assembled them in a row vertically and the seems are not really a factor in terms of obstructing view or being distracting.  The "image" is good with clear reflection and no odd distorted effects. They all arrived intact and had no damage. These are actual glass tiles not the plastic mirror-like material you often see with behind-the-door mirrors.  As a result, I was also concerned with their weight as I didn't want to risk heavy glass panels falling in my daughter's room.  These are actually fairly thin -- which worked well for my application.  They come with more than enough double sided mounting tape and they hold very well.  No concern whatsoever that these will fall. If you are looking for some easily mountable glass panels -- especially for the back of the door -- these will work well for you.  Price was fair and quality seems very good.  As for longevity, they are in place firmly and I don't see anyone disturbing them on the back of the door so I anticipate it will last a long time. Read more 14 people found this helpful Helpful Report Fuchsia Angel 4.0 out of 5 stars Great option for a fraction of the price! Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023 Size: 14''x12''-16PCS Verified Purchase I bought two 24 packs of the 12"x14" mirror tiles for my home gym project, which gave me an 8' wide x 5' tall mirror. It's not perfect (pros and cons below), but I still love it and am very satisfied with this purchase! Pros: 1) I love that I was able to build a giant mirror for only about $180 (after buying 3m Command Strips as an alternative installation option). 2) Easy and cheap shipping (they come in a very small box). 3) Easy install (with 3m Command Strips you can remove the tiles and put them back up as many times as needed to get it perfect). 4) Modular and scalable you can set them up in any configuration or shape you want and expand/add more later. 5) If you move to a new place, you can take them with you (just buy more Command Strips). 6) The tiles look like real mirrors. 7) Speedy delivery. Cons: 1) Distorted image or gaps between tiles. If you put them right up against eachother the cracks distort the image. If you put a small gap between them it looks better but then you have tiny gaps. With the 3m Command Strips, I was able to do lots of trial and error to get the most seamless mirror possible, but it's still not absolutely perfect. 2) The sticky stuff they provide (glue and double sided sticky foam) will ruin a wall if you need to remove them (see other reviews). This is where the 3m Command Strips come in. I got the "small" size and cut them in half, putting one in each corner of every tile, and haven't had a single issue. These added about $40 to my total project cost, but is well worth it for the ease of installation, removal and moveability. All in all, I would go this route again if I ever have to set up another home gym on a budget. It is a very affordable and easy way to have a huge mirror. You just have to decide if you want small gaps between tiles or a fun house effect along the edges, which still beats spending a thousand dollars on a giant heavy mirror in my opinion. I went with the funhouse option, but it doesn't bother me when I think about how much money I saved. Read more Fuchsia Angel 4.0 out of 5 stars Great option for a fraction of the price! Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023 I bought two 24 packs of the 12"x14" mirror tiles for my home gym project, which gave me an 8' wide x 5' tall mirror. It's not perfect (pros and cons below), but I still love it and am very satisfied with this purchase! Pros: 1) I love that I was able to build a giant mirror for only about $180 (after buying 3m Command Strips as an alternative installation option). 2) Easy and cheap shipping (they come in a very small box). 3) Easy install (with 3m Command Strips you can remove the tiles and put them back up as many times as needed to get it perfect). 4) Modular and scalable you can set them up in any configuration or shape you want and expand/add more later. 5) If you move to a new place, you can take them with you (just buy more Command Strips). 6) The tiles look like real mirrors. 7) Speedy delivery. Cons: 1) Distorted image or gaps between tiles. If you put them right up against eachother the cracks distort the image. If you put a small gap between them it looks better but then you have tiny gaps. With the 3m Command Strips, I was able to do lots of trial and error to get the most seamless mirror possible, but it's still not absolutely perfect. 2) The sticky stuff they provide (glue and double sided sticky foam) will ruin a wall if you need to remove them (see other reviews). This is where the 3m Command Strips come in. I got the "small" size and cut them in half, putting one in each corner of every tile, and haven't had a single issue. These added about $40 to my total project cost, but is well worth it for the ease of installation, removal and moveability. All in all, I would go this route again if I ever have to set up another home gym on a budget. It is a very affordable and easy way to have a huge mirror. You just have to decide if you want small gaps between tiles or a fun house effect along the edges, which still beats spending a thousand dollars on a giant heavy mirror in my opinion. I went with the funhouse option, but it doesn't bother me when I think about how much money I saved. To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. Anik Datta 5.0 out of 5 stars Adds a modern touch while providing a comfortable backrest Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2024 Color: Dark Grey Size: Queen Style: Modern Verified Purchase The Allewie Upholstered Queen Size Platform Bed Frame with 4 Storage Drawers is an outstanding choice for anyone seeking both style and practicality in their bedroom. Its elegant design, featuring a tufted headboard, adds a modern touch while providing a comfortable backrest for reading or relaxing. The four storage drawers are a significant advantage, offering ample space to keep your bedroom organized and clutter-free. Many users appreciate the sturdy construction, which combines metal and wood, ensuring durability and stability for a restful night's sleep. Additionally, the easy assembly process allows you to set it up quickly, making it a convenient option for busy individuals or families. Overall, this bed frame is highly praised for its blend of functionality and aesthetic appeal, making it a fantastic addition to any home. Read more 7 people found this helpful Helpful Report Amazon Customer 5.0 out of 5 stars Pleasantly surprise for the price! Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2024 Color: Light Grey Size: Queen Style: Modern Verified Purchase I've put together a lot of furniture over the years.  This bed is sturdy!  The parts were good quality and the instructions easy to follow.  It only takes a single included allen wrench to assemble.  The wrench could be better to ease assembly but its a one time use and then thrown away.  The fit and finish is good.  While the headboard isn't grand or plush, it simple and elegant.  Once completely assembled the bed is sturdy.  At first the wood slats seem undersized, but once the mattress is on I couldn't tell.  It would take an adult to jump up and down on the mattress to possibly break it.  Don't plan on putting heavy items in the drawers as they are wire baskets on wheels.  They are great for winter clothes, wrapping paper, spare linens etc..  I'm using this bed in a guest room.  It would be great for kids/teen bedrooms and if your on a budget the master bedroom.  5 for sturdiness, style, and assembly.  4 on the drawers.  This is a post assembly review, not a long term review. Read more 18 people found this helpful Helpful Report Justin 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice bed Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2024 Color: Light Grey Size: King Style: Antique Verified Purchase We purchased this as a Prime Day deal. We've wanted a bed like this for a long time, but were hoping we'd find one that wasn't a platform bed. We couldn't pass up the deal on this, so went ahead and ordered it. Installation wasn't hard at all. The bed is very sturdy and eye appealing. My main downfall is the drawers. They seem very flimsy and get stuck...a lot. Other than that, great bed! Read more 5 people found this helpful Helpful Report Natasha A Kurtz 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality, Very Happy Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2024 Color: Light Grey Size: Queen Style: Antique Verified Purchase Assembled and started using this a few days ago, and I'm so happy with it. The frame itself is super sturdy and stable, all metal pieces and thick screws/bolts, with very precise dimensions not allowing it to wiggle around at all, so it's squeak-free so far. Every piece was labeled and the instructions pamphlet was easy to follow, with all the screws and other tiny pieces very well-packaged and labeled as well. The cloth on the headboard, footboard and draws is soft and decent quality. The gray is bit better-looking in person than in the photos, it should be pretty versatile to work with your decor. Pros: - very solid, sturdy - easy-ish assembly (lot of steps, but easy-to-follow instructions) - very, very high quality for the price - great engineering Cons: - it's super heavy when assembled, you will likely have to disassemble it to move it to another home - the wooden support slats use thick plastic pegs instead of bolts to attach to the frame; the pegs may dry-rot over time and need to be replaced with bolts Summary: I'm super happy with this purchase, and honestly think it will be worth the disassembly and reassembly for our next move. If it suits your fashion, I highly recommend. Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2024 Color: Dark Grey Size: King Style: Modern Verified Purchase I recently upgraded to the Allewie Upholstered King Size Platform Bed Frame with 4 Storage Drawers and Headboard, and it has exceeded all expectations, earning a solid 5-star rating. This bed frame seamlessly blends style with functionality, providing a luxurious sleeping space with added storage convenience. Design and Construction: The upholstered headboard adds a touch of sophistication, creating a focal point in the bedroom. The neutral color complements various decor styles, allowing for easy integration into any room. The quality of the upholstery is evident, providing both comfort and durability. Storage Drawers: The four spacious storage drawers integrated into the bed frame are a game-changer for those seeking additional space in the bedroom. These drawers effortlessly slide in and out, offering a discreet and organized solution for storing extra linens, clothing, or personal items. The design ensures that the drawers are seamlessly integrated, maintaining the overall aesthetic appeal of the bed. Sturdiness and Support: The platform design eliminates the need for a box spring, providing excellent support for the mattress. The construction is robust, and the bed frame feels solid and secure. Even with the added storage drawers, there is no compromise on stability. Easy Assembly: One notable feature is the straightforward assembly process. The instructions are clear, and all necessary tools are provided. The bed frame came together seamlessly, and I appreciated the attention to detail in the assembly instructions. Overall Comfort: Beyond its practical features, the Allewie bed frame offers a comfortable and inviting sleeping space. The padded headboard provides a supportive surface for sitting up and reading or watching TV. In conclusion, the Allewie Upholstered King Size Platform Bed Frame has transformed my bedroom into a stylish and organized sanctuary. It's a perfect blend of elegance and practicality, and the added storage drawers are a true asset. If you're in search of a high-quality, functional, and aesthetically pleasing bed frame, look no further. Highly recommended! Amazon's Choice in Bookcases by Yoobure 1 sustainability feature Sustainability features This product has sustainability features recognized by trusted certifications. Forestry practices Made with materials from well-managed forests, recycled materials, and/or other controlled wood sources. As certified by The Forest Stewardship Council The Forest Stewardship Council The Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) supports responsible forestry, which is a vital solution to combat climate change. Choosing FSC-certified products –  whether furniture, building materials, paper, rubber, or textiles – helps protect forests, wildlife, clean water and supports the Indigenous Peoples, forest workers and communities who depend on them. Choosing FSC-certified  products can also help to mitigate climate change by supporting responsible management of the world’s forests. For a better  future, choose FSC. Color: Rustic Brown 1 option from $49.99 1 option from $49.99 1 option from $49.99 1 option from $49.99 10 options from $42.20 1 option from $49.99 Purchase options and add-ons Room Type Study Room Number of Shelves 6 Special Feature Waterproof, Durable Product Dimensions 7.8"D x 15"W x 45"H Style Modern Age Range (Description) Adult Finish Type Wood Brand Yoobure Product Care Instructions Wipe with Dry Cloth Size 45"H See more Material Wood Mounting Type Floor Mount Shelf Type Tiered Shelf Shape Rectangular About this item 【Modern Bookshelf Design】The book shelf combines modern design with vintage colors, and it presents a unique personality along with a warm atmosphere that can blend in with most home decor styles. The multifunctional partition design of the book case is perfect for displaying your books, CDs, magazines, video games, manga, decorations, novels, speakers and more. 【Save Space & Decor Room】Yoobure bookshelves dimensions: 44.48"H*15"L*"7.87"W. The corner bookcase has 6 storage areas, each storage area can hold 5–10 books. With its open design and small footprint, this narrow bookshelf is easy to move and organize, making it ideal for corners and small spaces and perfect for use in living rooms, offices and bedrooms. While saving space, this small bookshelf is also a work of art, suitable as a gift for family or friends. 【Sturdy & Durable】The skinny bookshelf is made of high-quality board material, which is not easy to break and has a tough and durable texture. And the tree geometric bookcase is designed with backboard reinforcement, which has strong load-bearing capacity. For added safety and stability, we offer anti tip furniture straps that allow you to secure corner bookshelf to the wall, especially for families with children and pets. 【Easy to Assemble & Clean】The product package includes easy-to-follow instructions, numbered parts, assembly tools and an installation video on the product page, allowing you to quickly and easily assemble this wood bookshelf. This tall bookshelf has a flat and waterproof surface that can be easily cleaned with a damp rag. 【Customer Service】We provide 1 year after-sales service for this book shelf organizer. If you have any questions and suggestions about our large bookshelf during installation and use, please feel free to contact us, our customer service team will always be there for you. Yoobure starts with the idea of offering comforts and utilities to our communities. Since 2016, offers a range of functional home furnishings that are really affordable for families around the world. What makes our products unique? We pour all sincerity to our products. We sell not only goods but reputation, and harvest full trust from customers all these years. Why do we love what we do? Fate makes us get acquainted and trust makes fate endless. We always keep in mind: to make people much happier here! How many books can the wooden book shelves hold? The spine bookshelf has 6 storage sections and a bottom storage space, each section can hold 5-10 books. Is there an installation tool provided? What tools do I need to prepare? The package includes easy-to-follow instructions, numbered parts and assembly tools, so you can quickly and easily assemble this tall bookcase. Choosing FSC-certified  products can also help to mitigate climate change by supporting responsible management of the world’s forests. For a better  future, choose FSC. To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. I imagine as I add more books, I'll probably mount it on the wall but for now it works as is. It took me probably an hour and a half to assemble and I only had one hiccup when it came to adding the last back panel. There are videos to assist you online which was nice. All the pieces necessary to assemble were included. This is ideal for limited space and if you want something a bit different than a traditional bookshelf. We did not do the wall anchor thing, and it is a *tad* wobbly at times even with heavier books at the bottom. But still decently sturdy & good quality, especially for the price. This took my husband about an hour to assemble, but said once got the pattern it made sense. To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. This bed is super cute and wasn’t hard to put together but it’s VERY weak and not sturdy at all. I didn’t even attempt to sleep on it until I could add more sturdiness. I went to my local home improvement store and added (24) 11” wood pieces ( 2 per horizontal slat ) and (2) 10” wood pieces ( 1 per vertical vertical slat ). Measurements are as so because of how the horizontal slats lay on top of the vertical slats but trust me they are accurate. Including wood screws, it only costed me about $25 and the store cut the pieces for me. *disclaimer I DO OWN A POWER DRILL so this was an easy fix* The bed is VERY sturdy now & does not budge whatsoever. Lifestyle Home Home Décor Miranda Lambert Dropped New Home Decor at Walmart — Shop Rugs, Throw Pillows, and More from $12 Including on-sale finds that are up to 52 percent off By Megan Schaltegger Megan Schaltegger Megan Schaltegger is a lifestyle and commerce writer. She has written for Cosmopolitan, Women's Health, Delish, PopSugar, and more. People Editorial Guidelines Published on September 26, 2024 07:30AM EDT Photo: Walmart (1); Getty (1) Walmart has an impressive roster of celebrity collaborations, including exclusive collections with Sofia Vergara , Drew Barrymore , Paris Hilton , and last but certainly not least, Miranda Lambert. The country singer-turned-businesswoman has an entire line of Southern-inspired home decor and kitchen essentials that will add the perfect dash of charm to your space, and we spotted new fall-ready pieces you’ll want to grab ASAP. Practically everything in Lambert’s Wanda June collection is under $30, too. We’re eyeing impressive deals on everything from cast iron cookware to cozy throw pillows, starting at just $12 at Walmart . Wanda June by Miranda Lambert Home Deals at Walmart Denim Pillow , $23 Bronzed Pre-Seasoned Cast Iron Grill Pan , $25 Textured Cotton Tassel Pillow , $21 Rust Pillow , $14 Retro Renegade Stoneware Square Baking Dish , $25 Hello Darlin’ 2-Piece Doormat , $12 (orig. $25) Stripe Washable Runner Area Rug , $12 Bordertown Buzz 7-Piece Bar Set , $25 Retro Renegade Assorted 22-Ounce Acrylic Tumblers , $13 Vintage Stripe 9-Inch Orange Stoneware Serving Bowl , $13 Big Mistake Orange Stoneware Baking Dish , $18 (orig. $25) Upgrade Your Space with These 10 Under-$30 Cozy Home Decor Finds Bordertown Buzz 7-Piece Bar Set Walmart $25 at Walmart This $25 cocktail set includes everything you need to cosplay as a bartender from home. There are four 2-ounce shot glasses, a stainless steel jigger, a 17-ounce glass shaker, and a stainless steel stirring spoon. The mixing cups even have recipes printed already on them, which one shopper called super convenient for hosting. Another customer added that it’s a super niche bar set that’s a perfect centerpiece for any table or shelf. Retro Renegade Stoneware Square Baking Dish Walmart $25 at Walmart Miranda Lambert’s five-star stoneware baking dish has earned perfect ratings thanks to its high-quality design and perfect size. The 8-inch design makes it ideal for brownies, breads, and casseroles, while the stoneware construction ensures even cooking throughout. Plus, it has wide handles that make it easy to carry, serve, or take out of the oven. Customers raved that it’s easy to clean and has even gone through the dishwasher without any issues. Bronzed Pre-Seasoned Cast Iron Grill Pan Walmart $25 at Walmart Once you go pre-seasoned cast iron pan, you never go back. This 11-inch design offers superior heat distribution and retention and is perfect for grilling patties, steaks, veggies, chicken, you name it. One skeptical shopper said they weren’t sure about purchasing the pan, but found it to be one of the best chances they’ve ever taken. They said it works wonders to whip up ribs, sausage, hamburgers, and more. Vintage Stripe 9-Inch Orange Stoneware Serving Bowl Walmart $13 at Walmart If you’re looking to fill your kitchen cabinets with unique and durable dinnerware, consider adding this charming vintage stripe serving bowl to your online cart. The bright colors will stand out in any tablescape, while the 9-inch design is a versatile size that fits a range of meals, like pasta, salads, and desserts. Reviewers called the bowl just the right size and weight, and said they’ve gotten so many compliments on it. Keep scrolling to browse home decor, kitchen essentials, and more from Miranda Lambert’s exclusive Walmart collection, starting at just $12. To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. Read more View Image Gallery Amazon Customer 5.0 out of 5 stars Images in this review Reviews with images See all photos Previous page Next page All photos Amazon Customer 5 out of 5 stars A very lightweight show rack We have a lot of shoes, and need lots of shoe racks.  We have used the same type of shoe rack for years, so we thought we would try out this Z&L HOUSE 4-Tier stackable Shoe Rack for our closet.All the parts were there, and everything fit together well.  Our only complaint is that is it somewhat flimsy.  It is made from bamboo, which is what we wanted, but since it does not have a stabilizing bar in the center, the shelves sag in the middle if you put any weight on it at all.  Plus, shoe boxes, or larger size shoes, will stick out the front by an inch or two.  I attached a picture to show this.So….if you are only going to put smaller, flatter walking shoes without boxes on this rack you are all good.  If you have bigger shoes, golf shoes, or high top sneakers you might not want this.  But for the money, this is a nice shoe rack.Recommended. Island Gal 5.0 out of 5 stars A very lightweight show rack Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2024 Verified Purchase We have a lot of shoes, and need lots of shoe racks.  We have used the same type of shoe rack for years, so we thought we would try out this Z&L HOUSE 4-Tier stackable Shoe Rack for our closet. All the parts were there, and everything fit together well.  Our only complaint is that is it somewhat flimsy.  It is made from bamboo, which is what we wanted, but since it does not have a stabilizing bar in the center, the shelves sag in the middle if you put any weight on it at all.  Plus, shoe boxes, or larger size shoes, will stick out the front by an inch or two.  I attached a picture to show this. So….if you are only going to put smaller, flatter walking shoes without boxes on this rack you are all good.  If you have bigger shoes, golf shoes, or high top sneakers you might not want this.  But for the money, this is a nice shoe rack. Recommended. Read more Island Gal 5.0 out of 5 stars A very lightweight show rack Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2024 We have a lot of shoes, and need lots of shoe racks.  We have used the same type of shoe rack for years, so we thought we would try out this Z&L HOUSE 4-Tier stackable Shoe Rack for our closet. All the parts were there, and everything fit together well.  Our only complaint is that is it somewhat flimsy.  It is made from bamboo, which is what we wanted, but since it does not have a stabilizing bar in the center, the shelves sag in the middle if you put any weight on it at all.  Plus, shoe boxes, or larger size shoes, will stick out the front by an inch or two.  I attached a picture to show this. So….if you are only going to put smaller, flatter walking shoes without boxes on this rack you are all good.  If you have bigger shoes, golf shoes, or high top sneakers you might not want this.  But for the money, this is a nice shoe rack. Recommended. Images in this review Helpful Report Catherine 5.0 out of 5 stars Maximize Your Space: Z&L HOUSE 3-Tier Bamboo Shoe Rack - A Stylish & Versatile Organizer! Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2024 Color: 3-tier Verified Purchase I purchased the Z&L HOUSE 3-Tier Shoe Rack for my entryway, and it has completely transformed my space management and organization. This shoe rack, highlighted as Amazon's Choice, not only met but exceeded my expectations with its functionality and aesthetic appeal. First off, the assembly of this bamboo shoe rack was straightforward and took minimal time, a relief for someone who's not particularly handy. The instructions were clear, and all necessary components fit together seamlessly. Once assembled, the rack felt sturdy and stable, a testament to its quality construction. The bamboo material is not only sustainable and eco-friendly but also adds a warm, natural touch to my home decor. Its design is sleek and minimalist, making it a versatile addition that blends well with various interior styles, from modern to rustic. Functionality-wise, the Z&L HOUSE 3-Tier Shoe Rack shines with its capacity and versatility. It comfortably holds up to 9 pairs of shoes, from sneakers to high heels, keeping them organized and easily accessible. The open design ensures that shoes air out properly, which is particularly beneficial in preventing odor buildup in the entryway or closet. One of the standout features of this shoe rack is its stackability. The design allows for easy stacking of another unit on top, offering a customizable solution that grows with your needs. This flexibility to expand is perfect for anyone who loves shoes and needs more space in the future. Moreover, the multifunctional aspect of this rack cannot be overstated. Beyond shoes, it serves as a handy shelf for storing various items such as bags, boxes, or even plants, making it a multi-purpose addition to any room. In conclusion, the Z&L HOUSE 3-Tier Bamboo Shoe Rack is a must-have for anyone looking to enhance their shoe storage solution. It offers an excellent balance of style, durability, and versatility, making it a valuable investment for keeping your entryway, closet, or hallway clutter-free and organized. Highly recommended for its practicality and chic design. I’d recommend it for someone who wants a shoe rack but can’t justify spending $30+ on Amazon anymore. It’s awful but I’ve come to love its simplicity. To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. Read more View Image Gallery Amazon Customer 5.0 out of 5 stars Images in this review Reviews with images See all photos Previous page Next page All photos Amazon Customer 4 out of 5 stars Don't give up on the gas lifts!!!! I love my new bed! It was simple to put together, only took me and my boyfriend about 1 1/2 - 2 hrs. I gave it only 4 stars simply because of the gas lifts!!! They took forever to mess with and my boyfriend could NOT, no matter how hard he tried, get the lifts to move!!! We took them off and he pushed down on them with all of his body weight (he's 6' tall & weighs 210) and still, not one inch!!! He was quickly irritated by the whole thing and gave up on them so I contacted the Allewie company who made the bed to try to get new parts.They emailed me back and told us to try it again but this time with the mattress on the bed. If after doing that the lifts still weren't working then they would send us new parts.I bought this bed on May 3rd and it was delivered by Amazon a few days later. So it's been just about three weeks since we assembled the bed together. So today before we tried to mess with it again, I read through the all of the negative reviews on Amazon expecting to find a lot of complaints about the lifts but there were 3 (there aren't that many total that are negative which shocked me)!!! One of them said basically the guy had the same issue we were having. He said he tried one week later and suddenly the lifts moved without any issues so.... I held up the bed while my boyfriend put the lifts on but he wasn't going to put the little screws on it until we tried to see if it worked first and sure enough!! I pushed on it with one hand and it started going down!! He still didn't believe me so he told me to push it down all the way and then go back up before he did anything else with it. So I tried and I  swear that it moves as smooth as butter  both up and down with only one hand!!!! I am so excited because I love the bed and the only problem I had was not being able to access the storage underneath without my boyfriend holding up the mattress!Sooo if you are reading this because you are having trouble getting the lifts to work, don't give up!!! Wait a bit, a few days or a week or two and try it again... Hopefully you'll have the same luck as I (and that other guy) did!!!Otherwise it's beautiful and I have zero complaints! I took pics of my bed down with some of my new stuff on it (it's a work in progress right now) and I love how it looks already!! I can't wait to see the finished product!! The storage feature is so convenient. It’s very easy to lift and stays up by itself. It also fits a lot of stuff! This bed is honestly a steal for the price and I would 100% recommend it!! Images in this review 8 people found this helpful Helpful Report Muther 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made and not difficult Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2024 Size: Queen Style: Traditional Color: Beige Verified Purchase The bed came well packaged with clear instructions. The box is heavy but I managed to get it up two flights of stairs with some patience. I'd recommend two people ideally, but I managed bearhugging it step by step I received all the parts and the two tools required. My greatest concern was the air jacks, as there were other reviews that had problems with them. Mine work as expected. Assembly took a couple hours, but it looks great. The quality of the materials are very good for the price, I think. The frame is sturdy and offers abundant storage space beneath. It was easy to assemble, my son and I started assembling it was easier to read than an ikea manual. My husband and son finished building it. We did try adding the box spring, but it would have been too tall and cove the headboard, so we decided to go without. The mattress had plenty of support. The bed frame is sturdy and doesn’t squeak, it’s a good height as well.  Good value for the money. Read more One person found this helpful Helpful Report Jagger Lulanaj 5.0 out of 5 stars Great choice for limited space Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2024 Size: Queen Style: Modern Color: Beige Verified Purchase Living in a somewhat small apartment means that space-saving solutions are more than just convenient—they're essential. That's where the Allewie Queen Size Lift Up Storage Bed comes into play, blending functionality with classic style in a way that enhances both the aesthetics and utility of my living space. The standout feature of this bed is undoubtedly its lift-up storage mechanism. Supported by hydraulics, the bed frame easily lifts to reveal a generous storage area underneath. While the frame is admittedly heavy, the hydraulic system significantly reduces the effort needed to access the storage space. Although it requires some force to lift, especially with a heavy mattress, this is a minor trade-off for the convenience and extra storage provided. The modern wingback headboard adds a touch of elegance and sophistication to the bed's overall design. It not only enhances the bed's appearance but also offers sturdy and comfortable support for reading or relaxing in bed. The classic style of the headboard makes this bed a versatile piece that fits seamlessly with various decor styles, making it ideal for anyone looking to upgrade their bedroom aesthetics. Durability and stability are key components of this bed's design. Once raised, the frame feels very sturdy, and there's no fear of it unexpectedly falling or dropping, which gives me peace of mind every time I use the storage feature. In conclusion, the Allewie Queen Size Lift Up Storage Bed is a fantastic choice for anyone with limited space who doesn't want to compromise on functionality/space saving. The added storage is a game-changer for small apartments, and the ease of use, coupled with its elegant design, makes this bed a valuable addition to any bedroom. Highly recommended for its practicality and streamlined look! Read more 34 people found this helpful Helpful Report Kelly Davis 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bed! Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2024 Size: Queen Style: Modern Color: Beige Verified Purchase Box arrived VERY heavy and really beat up, one end was torn open and a rain storm was coming so I had to scoot it into the garage before it rained, then carried the pieces inside. Queen size bed looks very nice in the room, surprisingly sturdy.  Beige color definitely leans more to gray than brown, we currently have beige walls that have more yellow tone in it and the beige bed looks gray against the wall.  Which is fine we are painting the room anyway.  Assembly took a couple of evenings after work and does at one point require 2 people to install the springs.  At first we put our old innerspring mattress on it and it lifted super easy.  Then we put the new Novaform foam mattress from Costco on it and it is noticeably heavier to lift.  Still doable by an able-bodied person but it definitely takes more oomph to lift.  Love all the storage under - we fit a pack n play, extra blankets, pillows and still quite a bit of room.  I admit putting things underneath up by the headboard makes me a bit nervous going under there because that mattress is heavy although the bed has given me no reason to think it will collapse, just the thought of it. All in all very pleased with this bed and considering buying a second. Read more 10 people found this helpful Helpful Report HLB 5.0 out of 5 stars Great storage and Assembly Instructions Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2024 Size: Full Style: Modern Color: Beige Verified Purchase I ordered this bed for a tiny bedroom. The box it is shipped in is heavy, and I needed my husband’s help to get it in house. Once I opened the box I had a slight panic attack over all the parts to assemble, but the instructions were easy to follow. It took me less than an hour to build myself, and I only needed my husband’s help during one of the steps which is lowering the storage component the first time - since it takes some strength for first use of the gas pump (I could have probably done it myself, although instructions say to use two people). Overall it is a nice bed and storage is great. The bed frame goes up and down easily to access storage. The fabric is just OK for headboard and the side seam is noticeable, but for price and the room I am using it in, I have no complaints and it looks nice and is great. I got the beige and it is definitely more grey. The bed is very sturdy and doesn’t wobble at all. Read more HLB 5.0 out of 5 stars Great storage and Assembly Instructions Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2024 I ordered this bed for a tiny bedroom. The box it is shipped in is heavy, and I needed my husband’s help to get it in house. Once I opened the box I had a slight panic attack over all the parts to assemble, but the instructions were easy to follow. It took me less than an hour to build myself, and I only needed my husband’s help during one of the steps which is lowering the storage component the first time - since it takes some strength for first use of the gas pump (I could have probably done it myself, although instructions say to use two people). Overall it is a nice bed and storage is great. The bed frame goes up and down easily to access storage. The fabric is just OK for headboard and the side seam is noticeable, but for price and the room I am using it in, I have no complaints and it looks nice and is great. I got the beige and it is definitely more grey. The bed is very sturdy and doesn’t wobble at all. User guide Installation Method Floor Mount Required Assembly Yes Style Finish Types Unfinished Furniture Finish Pine Style Name Modern Shape Round Materials & Care Product Care Instructions Wipe with Dry Cloth Material Type Pine Features & Specs Recommended Uses For Product Book storage and display Number of Items 1 Shelf Type Corner Shelf Number Of Shelves 4 Additional Features Space Saving Mounting Type Floor Mount Room Type Kids Room, Bedroom, Living Room, Library, Dining Room Product Description The bookshelf is made of pure natural pine wood, no paint, hand sanded with smooth edges. Can be used directly without paint. You can also paint it yourself according to personal preference. size: The total height of the bookshelf: 50.4 inch (128cm). A total of 4 layers, each layer height: 11.6 inch (29.5cm). Diameter: 17.3 inch (44cm). Super large capacity: It can hold about 100 medium-sized books. Tall/deep enough to fit trade paperback graphic novels. Pretty stable: Once assembled, it is very stable, and it has been tested that children under the age of 14 cannot push it down. During the entire rotation process of the bookshelf, the bookshelf will not have any shaking. Space saving: Takes up very little space. Can be placed in any corner of the room. But it can make every room look like a small library. Free assembly mode: can be assembled into a 1-layer, 2-layer, 3-layer or 4-layer bookshelf at will. Made of pine wood, no paint, no smell, hand polished, no burrs. To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. Please try again later. ungodwyn 5.0 out of 5 stars This actually works!  Took about 30 min to assemble, handles many sizes of kids books. Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2023 Size: 4-Tier Verified Purchase This actually works great for most sizes of children's books, and so far seems pretty sturdy.  I was worried it might be a tipping hazard  for my toddler before I bought it, but after 1 month of use I am not still concerned.  (We put heavier books on the bottom and lightweight DVDs / stuffed animals on the top).  If I was really paranoid I might have left off the top shelf, to make it 25% shorter,  ( I think they sell a shorter one, too)  but so far the 4-shelf version seems to handle daily usage in the nursery just fine. The wood shelves are secured with hex-head wood-screws , tools and gloves are included,  and installation went fine except for one very minor crack while tightening one upper side-piece.  Overall,  tolerances and design seem pretty good for an affordable flat-packed spinning shelf.  My kid likes turning it and picking out books to read at bedtime. This books handles ~90% of kids books just fine (Tall ones, short ones,  big ones, small ones) However, there is one book shape that it is not good for:  Some kids books (like "P is for Pterodactyl)  have short heights and really long page-widths.  ( approx ~8.5" H x11.25W) . For these books you probably should use a different shelf, because they will stick out too far and fall off easily  unless  rotated vertically.  But again, this issue affects is less than 10% of our kid's books.  The good news that it handles even fairly large format books quite well, eg, "Daullieres' Book of Greek Myths" fits fine once the shelf is filled. Images in this review One person found this helpful Helpful Report Laura Gibbs 5.0 out of 5 stars excellent efficient way to organize books Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2024 Size: 2-tier Verified Purchase I bought one of these for myself, then I bought one for a friend and two more for myself, and I just ordered one more for myself; they are an ideal solution for storing books in small spaces, like in the corner of a room, under a desk, etc. The unit is very easy to assemble (one step in the instructions is not explained well: don't forget to screw in the middle platform after you fit it into the slots!), and I like the fancy doily that comes with it to cover the screws and slots on the top shelf when it's all done. I had run out of wall space for traditional bookshelves, so I am very glad that I found this rotating alternative. The two photos show the first one I got for under my desk and a brand-new one that I just assembled today. I read the negative reviews and they do not match my experience: all the wood was nicely sanded, the packaging was extremely well done (with only a small amount of styrofoam and plastic for the garbage), and loaded up with books, the shelf spins easily and feels very sturdy. Highly recommended. Read more Laura Gibbs 5.0 out of 5 stars excellent efficient way to organize books Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2024 I bought one of these for myself, then I bought one for a friend and two more for myself, and I just ordered one more for myself; they are an ideal solution for storing books in small spaces, like in the corner of a room, under a desk, etc. The unit is very easy to assemble (one step in the instructions is not explained well: don't forget to screw in the middle platform after you fit it into the slots!), and I like the fancy doily that comes with it to cover the screws and slots on the top shelf when it's all done. I had run out of wall space for traditional bookshelves, so I am very glad that I found this rotating alternative. The two photos show the first one I got for under my desk and a brand-new one that I just assembled today. I read the negative reviews and they do not match my experience: all the wood was nicely sanded, the packaging was extremely well done (with only a small amount of styrofoam and plastic for the garbage), and loaded up with books, the shelf spins easily and feels very sturdy. Highly recommended. Images in this review 2 people found this helpful Helpful Report Sam C 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for stamp Dvd cases Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2022 Size: 4-Tier Verified Purchase I bought this 4 tier unit to hold stamp cases. Vertically, I can get 10 In each slot, 40 on each tier, 160 on full unit.  I can add another 5 per slot horizontally if necessary (80 more cases) 😁.  That would be 240 cases. 😱😁👍 I also found paper pumpkin boxes for 3 per slot. Convenient! The unit was easy to build. Unfinished wood could have been sealed, stained, painted before building. I liked the raw look. All edges are sanded so no splinters.  Brass screws. Solid, no wobble.  I had only one baffle (side ends) crack at the bottom when screwed in place. Not very noticeable.  The top is not a finished look. I will have it covered so I didn't care. The box came screws and only took necessary to build. Also a couple surprises arrived:  white knit gloves to help get some torque when turning the screws. And a vinyl golden doily for the top. 😁👍 Highly recommend for crafters storage. To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. Learn more how customers reviews work on Amazon Customers say Customers like the appearance, value for money, and storage capacity of the table. They mention it looks great, is a good buy for the money spent, and has a nice hidden compartment. Some are happy with its functionality. However, some customers have issues with the leg support. Read more Helpful Report Amazon_Name 5.0 out of 5 stars A great mid century coffee table for a reasonable price. Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024 Color: Espresso Size: 39.37"D x 19.69"W x 16.93"H Verified Purchase I needed a coffee table and I saw this one and read the reviews so I went for it. Overall, it's a nice piece. The finish seems a little fragile so use coasters and don't put anything with rough edges on it. If a big dog jumps up on this, it's all over. The pull-up table is okay but a touch wobbly. I really don't use that part of it but I do enjoy the storage. My only issue is that it's rather small once you get it set up. I'd love the table more if it was twice as long. Also, they should really pre-assemble this and just ship it so you screw the legs on it (I got a file cabinet like that so I know they can do it). Anyway, I really can't complain for the price. I gave it a lot of stars because I needed one and this works. Also, it showed up on my doorstep so I didn't have to go to the store, deal with salespeople, wait a month, schedule the delivery. It just showed up with Prime. I'd recommend and I'd get this again for another room. I hope this helps you make an informed decision. Read more 15 people found this helpful Helpful Report JonB 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for smaller family rooms Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2024 Color: Retro Brown Size: 39.37"D x 19.69"W x 16.93"H Verified Purchase I was reluctant to buy this, due to needing to downgrade my original coffee table which was very sturdy but too large for my family room and lacking adequate storage.  After some quick comparisons to other brands and reading reviews, I chose this one.  The reluctancy was due to the material as I know MDF is just not a long term solution. Putting it together was actually a breeze, I don't really understand the negative reviews mentioning this because I was able to put this together in about half an hour - The instructions, although minimal, are pretty clear and simple. Overall it actually is pretty nice and the size was perfect for my family room which is fairly small.  My one issue is with the lift top itself - it's pretty awkward to lift and wobbly.  I'm afraid over time this will only proceed to get worse but I knew going into this that this coffee table was not a long term solution but good enough for at least a 2 year life span if taken care of properly. Long story short:  For a lower budget option, the look is very nice and if styled correctly can really stand out.  The biggest drawback is the sturdiness of the lifts and ease of use of the lift feature. In conclusion, this coffee table is a stylish and functional addition to any home. To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. Read more "Super cute & easy to put together but i’m missing the second door so it looks dumb. emailed them about it and no answer :/" Read more View Image Gallery Amazon Customer 5.0 out of 5 stars Images in this review Reviews with images See all photos Previous page Next page All photos Amazon Customer 5 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble, great value for the price I love this TV stand! It was very easy to assemble and didn’t take too long to assemble, about an hour with two people that weren’t in a rush. For only $90, it looks pretty nice and the rattan makes it look more expensive than it is. My ONLY CON/NEGATIVE is thay the top plywood where the TV rests curves with the TV weighing on it. It’s not too TOO noticeable but you can see the slight curve in the middle if you stare. But for $90, I’m not sweating about it. Maybe adding our TV’s feet/legs will alleviate this issue. But overall, great TV stand! Amazon's Choice 1 sustainability feature Sustainability features This product has sustainability features recognized by trusted certifications. Forestry practices Made with materials from well-managed forests, recycled materials, and/or other controlled wood sources. As certified by The Forest Stewardship Council The Forest Stewardship Council The Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) supports responsible forestry, which is a vital solution to combat climate change. Choosing FSC-certified products –  whether furniture, building materials, paper, rubber, or textiles – helps protect forests, wildlife, clean water and supports the Indigenous Peoples, forest workers and communities who depend on them. Choosing FSC-certified  products can also help to mitigate climate change by supporting responsible management of the world’s forests. For a better  future, choose FSC. Metal corner guards help reinforce the lid and thick MDF boards support the tops and sides, allowing the ottoman to hold a static load capacity of 660 lb [Comfortable Seating] Filled with high-density foam and covered in linen-look fabric, this storage bench provides a soft, supportive, and breathable seat for optimal comfort [Plenty of Storage Space] This folding ottoman, sized 15”D x 43"W x 15”H (38 x 110 x 38 cm) with a total capacity of 35 gallons, can be used to neatly organize your bed sheets, pillows, blankets, magazines, and more [Easy to Set Up & Fold Away] With its unique folding design, this storage bench can be set up in just a few seconds. It conveniently folds flat for easy storage when not in use, saving space in your home [Versatile Uses] Use this storage ottoman as a storage box, footstool, or even a coffee table! Forestry practices Made with materials from well-managed forests, recycled materials, and/or other controlled wood sources. As certified by The Forest Stewardship Council The Forest Stewardship Council The Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) supports responsible forestry, which is a vital solution to combat climate change. Choosing FSC-certified products –  whether furniture, building materials, paper, rubber, or textiles – helps protect forests, wildlife, clean water and supports the Indigenous Peoples, forest workers and communities who depend on them. Choosing FSC-certified  products can also help to mitigate climate change by supporting responsible management of the world’s forests. For a better  future, choose FSC. To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. I plan on buying another one but a bigger size to hold my kids toys. 10/10 would recommend:) Images in this review 5 people found this helpful Helpful Report Amanda*C 5.0 out of 5 stars What I was looking for plus extras I didn’t expect. Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2024 Color: Dark Blue Size: 43''W Verified Purchase I bought this ottoman as an attractive option for hiding toys, blankets and everything else that ends up on my living room floor..and it delivered plus some. It's big enough to store a bunch of my kiddos' toys, blankets, or even some of those bulky winter clothes that just take up so much space. And let me tell you, having that extra storage has been a blessing for keeping the living room from looking like a toy bomb exploded. Now, besides being this magic box that swallows clutter, it's also pretty sturdy. I've sat on it more times than I can count, and it's held up like a champ, making it a nice little spot to plop down and have a coffee break. The kids also use it as a makeshift stage for their performances, and it's survived, so that's saying something. The fact that it folds is pretty neat too. I mean, I haven't had to fold it away yet because it's constantly in use, but it's nice to know that if we ever needed to, we could easily tuck it away. Plus, assembling it was a piece of cake, which is always a huge plus because who has the time for complicated setups, right? However, it's not all rainbows and butterflies. The material isn't the most luxurious; it's more on the practical side. So if you're looking for something that screams "elegance" and "high-end," this might not hit the mark. Also, because it's so functional and useful, it tends to become a bit of a catch-all. Sometimes, it feels like I'm constantly fishing things out of it or reminding the kids not to just shove everything in there. But honestly, for the price and the sheer utility of it, those cons are pretty minor. It's kind of become a must-have for me in keeping a semblance of order with the chaos of kids running around. So yeah, big thumbs up from this mom! Read more 38 people found this helpful Helpful Report Shoppers 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Storage Solution with a Stylish Look! Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2024 Color: Dark Gray Size: 30''W Verified Purchase The SONGMICS 30-Inch Folding Storage Ottoman Bench has been a wonderful addition to my living room. It offers plenty of storage space for blankets, pillows, and other items, which helps keep things tidy. The fact that it folds up is a bonus—it’s perfect for smaller spaces or for someone who needs versatile storage solutions. The bench looks sleek and stylish, and it also functions well as a footrest or extra seating when guests come over. It feels sturdy, and I’m impressed by how much it can hold without losing its shape. The only reason I’m giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is that the padding on the top could be a bit thicker for more comfort when sitting on it for extended periods. Other than that, it’s a great buy for the price! Practical, functional, and looks great! To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. Read more View Image Gallery Amazon Customer 5.0 out of 5 stars Images in this review Reviews with images See all photos Previous page Next page All photos Amazon Customer 5 out of 5 stars (Light Blue review) Crazy that this is only $170!!! So versatile and comfortable (enough) I was doing a living room update and wanted to keep things in budget. Furniture is absolutely ridiculously priced these days, ahem *joybird* cough cough...I didn't need hand crafted artisinal pieces from finland or something...-Now, this is not a super beautiful piece... It's not going to win any awards.But it's cheap and versatile so it fit my needs and standards.-I replaced the wheels with heavy duty casters that swivel so I could push the ottoman around with relative easy... The wheels that came with it for the pull-out part are static wheels to pull the piece straight in and out... I don't use the pull out too often but I do appreciate that it's there if someone comes to visit and we watch a film or tv show etc, I want them to be able to relax and pull the bed portion out if they want to.-Since I do use it as an ottoman, I did not install the back piece. I don't really mind the black portion but if you have kids the two metal slots for the backpiece can be sharp if bumped into.... So just a word of warning if you also do not want to use the backpiece.Adding a back piece kinda defeats the purpose of an ottoman in my opinion... but to each their own.-The fabric is funky but cool enough that it fits in my room. I have a the FlutterBy multi-color rug by Ruggable and the color of blue works perfectly without being too matchy matchy... It also looks great next to my tan leather couch and pink velvet loveseat/chair...I've used it to read on and like the adjustable back... I could probably sleep on it if I really had to but I haven't napped on it really. It's cozy enough to lay on though.-Attached photos of the pull out portion along with the wheels I installed that were like $8 for 4.Worth the upgrade for how I use the piece.For the price, what are you waiting for!? Get it!Oh I also painted the wood legs Gold... Just cuz I like having gold accents in my living room. Did the same for my pink velvet chair ;) More Hide Thank you for your feedback Close Sorry, there was an error Close Sorry we couldn't load the review Try again Sort reviews by Top reviews Most recent Top reviews Top reviews from the United States There was a problem filtering reviews right now. Read more 2 people found this helpful Helpful Report Freeze Dat! 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2024 Color: Light Blue Verified Purchase This sleeper sofa  is a great space-saving option for small apartments, dorm rooms or home offices. While it performs well as a compact loveseat or ottoman during the day, it easily folds out to a single bed for overnight guests. The light blue upholstery has a modern, clean-lined look that will fit into most decor styles. It also has adjustable backrests and armrests for customizable comfort while seating two. As with many futon-style couch beds, this one is quite firm and not the most cushiony seat. However, for the price and versatility in a tight space, it's difficult to beat. The fold-out mattress is comfortable enough for one person to sleep on. Overall, this 4-in-1 futon couch/ottoman/loveseat  is a practical furniture piece that saves space without compromising functionality. Its transformable design makes it suitable for small living quarters like apartments, dorms or home offices. Read more One person found this helpful Helpful Report pfictionfan4life 5.0 out of 5 stars (Light Blue review) Crazy that this is only $170!!! So versatile and comfortable (enough) Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2024 Color: Light Blue Verified Purchase I was doing a living room update and wanted to keep things in budget. Furniture is absolutely ridiculously priced these days, ahem *joybird* cough cough... I didn't need hand crafted artisinal pieces from finland or something... - Now, this is not a super beautiful piece... It's not going to win any awards. But it's cheap and versatile so it fit my needs and standards. - I replaced the wheels with heavy duty casters that swivel so I could push the ottoman around with relative easy... The wheels that came with it for the pull-out part are static wheels to pull the piece straight in and out... I don't use the pull out too often but I do appreciate that it's there if someone comes to visit and we watch a film or tv show etc, I want them to be able to relax and pull the bed portion out if they want to. - Since I do use it as an ottoman, I did not install the back piece. I don't really mind the black portion but if you have kids the two metal slots for the backpiece can be sharp if bumped into.... So just a word of warning if you also do not want to use the backpiece. Adding a back piece kinda defeats the purpose of an ottoman in my opinion... but to each their own. - The fabric is funky but cool enough that it fits in my room. I have a the FlutterBy multi-color rug by Ruggable and the color of blue works perfectly without being too matchy matchy... It also looks great next to my tan leather couch and pink velvet loveseat/chair... I've used it to read on and like the adjustable back... I could probably sleep on it if I really had to but I haven't napped on it really. It's cozy enough to lay on though. - Attached photos of the pull out portion along with the wheels I installed that were like $8 for 4. Worth the upgrade for how I use the piece. For the price, what are you waiting for!? Get it! Oh I also painted the wood legs Gold... Just cuz I like having gold accents in my living room.
