But it's cheap and versatile so it fit my needs and standards. - I replaced the wheels with heavy duty casters that swivel so I could push the ottoman around with relative easy... The wheels that came with it for the pull-out part are static wheels to pull the piece straight in and out... I don't use the pull out too often but I do appreciate that it's there if someone comes to visit and we watch a film or tv show etc, I want them to be able to relax and pull the bed portion out if they want to. - Since I do use it as an ottoman, I did not install the back piece. I don't really mind the black portion but if you have kids the two metal slots for the backpiece can be sharp if bumped into.... So just a word of warning if you also do not want to use the backpiece. Adding a back piece kinda defeats the purpose of an ottoman in my opinion... but to each their own. - The fabric is funky but cool enough that it fits in my room. I have a the FlutterBy multi-color rug by Ruggable and the color of blue works perfectly without being too matchy matchy... It also looks great next to my tan leather couch and pink velvet loveseat/chair... I've used it to read on and like the adjustable back... I could probably sleep on it if I really had to but I haven't napped on it really. It's cozy enough to lay on though. - Attached photos of the pull out portion along with the wheels I installed that were like $8 for 4. Worth the upgrade for how I use the piece. For the price, what are you waiting for!? Get it! Oh I also painted the wood legs Gold... Just cuz I like having gold accents in my living room. Did the same for my pink velvet chair ;) Images in this review 15 people found this helpful Helpful Report FluffCycle 1.0 out of 5 stars Very hard Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2024 Color: Dark Grey Verified Purchase This is really uncomfortable for sleeping. I always try things before I ask my guests to sleep on them. I had to get up in the middle of the night and go back to my normal bed because this was so hard. I then bought a foam pad to see if that helped. It did not. It is a rock. Maybe you could nap for 10 mins, but definitely don't expect to be able to sleep on it. Maybe little kids can because they can sleep on a pile of legos, but normal human adults cannot.  I tried to return it, but got a ton of pushback, offered to drop it at the place they told me to ship it to and they said I could not do that; that I had to ship it, even though it's only a few miles away.  Eventually agreed to get $50 off the cost, but I don't think I ever got that credit, so I'm gathering the energy to try and at least get that promised credit. Really think twice about this. I did end up buying a nice little fold out pad that just lays on the floor and is actually comfortable (I tried it).  Bummer because it looks like a good idea. Read more 9 people found this helpful Helpful Report L7 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size for small offices Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2024 Color: Light Blue Verified Purchase While the box looks huge when shipped, the couch is the right size for my cubicle office. See dog for scale. Can fit a large man or anyone smaller. Easy to assemble and rolls well. Now if you have carpet, add some carpet slider discs to the bottom legs and make your life easier. Pulls out nicely as well. I haven’t slept on it so that update later. The wheels are a little bit of hassle to install. Definitely use a power drill. By hand with screw driver they include is tiresome. You can combine them as you like. 【STRONG AND DURABLE】 Made of denser and uniform particle board, the white marble patterned desktop has a modern and elegant appearance. The thickness is 0.59", and The surface of the coffee table is scratch-resistant and waterproof, which is very strong and durable. 【ELEGANCE & FASHIONABLE】 Designed in modern style, the nesting coffee table set is elegant and minimalist, bringing charm to your living room and giving your visitors a good impression of your home. 【UNIQUE & INGENIOUS】 The round tabletop and semi-circular steel leg design style is unique and ingenious. Stabler and more durable than other materials, the semi-circular steel leg not only has smoother and more beautiful lines but also is more secure than other square legs, which can avoid injury. 【EASY TO ASSEMBLE】 You can easily set it up in just a few minutes. Simple Installation Not only with the installation manual, we also made an installation instruction video and uploaded it on the page for your reference. Multiple Uses These tables can be placed in the living room or bedroom room as needed. It can be used as a side table or as a bedside table to place lamps and books. The elegant and retro design makes it very suitable for many home decorations. Specifications: Large Table: Φ 23.6 × 17.7 inches Small Table: Φ 15.7 × 15.7 inches Large Table: load capacity 99lbs Small Table: load capacity 66lbs Plate Thickness: 0.59 inches Materials: Steel Frame & MDF Board STRONG AND DURABLE Made of denser and uniform particle board, the walnut patterned desktop has a retro and elegant appearance. The thickness is 0.59", and the surface is scratch-resistant and waterproof, which is very strong and durable. Adjustable Non-slip Foot Pads The table feet are non-slip, and the plastic pad at the bottom avoids scratching the floor. It is suitable for wooden floors, tile floors, etc. If your floor is uneven, you can adjust the height with the screws of the foot pads to avoid tilting the table. Sturdy Metal Stand Supports Fastened with double screws, the sturdy metal stand supports your desktop smoothly. The metal surface has been rust-proofed and is extremely durable. The edges of the bracket are smooth, making it safer to use. Free Combination The nesting coffee tables include a large table (Φ 23.6 × 19.7 inch) and a small table (Φ 15.7 × 16.3 inch). Small table can be placed under the bigger one. You can combine them as you like. Brief content visible, double tap to read full content. Full content visible, double tap to read brief content. To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. Learn more how customers reviews work on Amazon Customers say Customers like the ease of assembly, size, and sturdiness of the desk. They mention it's simple yet aesthetically pleasing, perfect for a small area, and has great stability. Some appreciate the foldability and appearance. Read more View Image Gallery Amazon Customer 5.0 out of 5 stars Images in this review Reviews with images See all photos Previous page Next page All photos Amazon Customer 4 out of 5 stars WOHOMO Folding Computer Desk: A Compact Solution for Small Spaces 1. PROBLEM I WAS TRYING TO SOLVE:I needed a compact desk for my small New York City apartment that could easily be set up for work and just as easily be stored away when not in use. With limited space, I wanted something versatile that wouldn’t dominate my living area.2. DID IT SOLVE THE PROBLEM?Yes, the WOHOMO Folding Computer Desk solved my problem perfectly! Its foldable design makes it ideal for small spaces, allowing me to quickly set up a workstation and then tuck it away when I’m done working.3. SPACE-SAVING DESIGN:This desk’s foldable design is a lifesaver in a tight living space. It folds completely flat, allowing me to store it under my bed or against a wall without taking up much room. It’s perfect for people who need flexibility in their home office setup.4. EASY ASSEMBLY:Assembly was a breeze. It took me less than 10 minutes to set it up right out of the box, and it doesn’t require any tools. Simply unfold the legs, and it’s ready to use. It’s as easy as it gets for a desk!5. DURABILITY AND BUILD:The rustic walnut finish adds a touch of elegance and fits well with any decor. Despite its lightweight nature, the desk is quite sturdy and has held up well under the weight of my laptop, monitor, and a few desk accessories. It doesn’t wobble, which is crucial when I’m typing away.6. FUNCTIONALITY:At 31.5 inches, this desk is spacious enough for a laptop and other essentials, making it perfect for writing, working on projects, or even as a study desk for students. It’s the right size for a small room or even a nook in your living area.7. PORTABILITY:One of the highlights of this desk is its portability. I can easily move it from my living room to my bedroom or anywhere else in the apartment, thanks to its lightweight design. It’s great for someone like me who loves rearranging furniture frequently.8. FINAL THOUGHTS:The WOHOMO Folding Computer Desk is a practical and stylish solution for anyone dealing with limited space. Its ease of use, compact design, and sturdy build make it a must-have for small apartments or dorm rooms. If you’re looking for a functional yet space-saving desk, I highly recommend this one! Read more 6 people found this helpful Helpful Report Rae & Zoe (Rozae) 4.0 out of 5 stars WOHOMO Folding Computer Desk: A Compact Solution for Small Spaces Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2024 Size: Small Size:31.5 x 15.7 Color: Brown Verified Purchase 1. PROBLEM I WAS TRYING TO SOLVE: I needed a compact desk for my small New York City apartment that could easily be set up for work and just as easily be stored away when not in use. With limited space, I wanted something versatile that wouldn’t dominate my living area. 2. DID IT SOLVE THE PROBLEM? Yes, the WOHOMO Folding Computer Desk solved my problem perfectly! Its foldable design makes it ideal for small spaces, allowing me to quickly set up a workstation and then tuck it away when I’m done working. 3. SPACE-SAVING DESIGN: This desk’s foldable design is a lifesaver in a tight living space. It folds completely flat, allowing me to store it under my bed or against a wall without taking up much room. It’s perfect for people who need flexibility in their home office setup. 4. EASY ASSEMBLY: Assembly was a breeze. It took me less than 10 minutes to set it up right out of the box, and it doesn’t require any tools. Simply unfold the legs, and it’s ready to use. It’s as easy as it gets for a desk! 5. DURABILITY AND BUILD: The rustic walnut finish adds a touch of elegance and fits well with any decor. Despite its lightweight nature, the desk is quite sturdy and has held up well under the weight of my laptop, monitor, and a few desk accessories. It doesn’t wobble, which is crucial when I’m typing away. 6. FUNCTIONALITY: At 31.5 inches, this desk is spacious enough for a laptop and other essentials, making it perfect for writing, working on projects, or even as a study desk for students. It’s the right size for a small room or even a nook in your living area. 7. PORTABILITY: One of the highlights of this desk is its portability. I can easily move it from my living room to my bedroom or anywhere else in the apartment, thanks to its lightweight design. It’s great for someone like me who loves rearranging furniture frequently. 8. FINAL THOUGHTS: The WOHOMO Folding Computer Desk is a practical and stylish solution for anyone dealing with limited space. Its ease of use, compact design, and sturdy build make it a must-have for small apartments or dorm rooms. If you’re looking for a functional yet space-saving desk, I highly recommend this one! It’s perfect for people who need flexibility in their home office setup. 4. EASY ASSEMBLY: Assembly was a breeze. To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. UPDATE: GREAT customer service Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2024 Color: Black Size: 16 Inches Verified Purchase UPDATE: Excellect service. I recived an email that was very well written and got a full refund for both my shelfs. They even wanted to know what ended up working so they can approve. Like I said in my original review the only issue was the anchor. i got two packs of these cause it was a great deal. The shelf itself is nice, and the steel rod is nice too, but the anchors are horrible. I put it in my wall and the shelf was straight and tilted towards me and extremely wobbly. I went and got new anchors and attempted to take out the old ones. they would not come out and i had to rip them out and it made a deep and biggish hole. 4. so, i had to patch them up. its past the return, bummed cause i like the look but its been a PAIN to put these shelves up. A simple project has turned into a headache. If you get these don’t use the anchor it came with, new anchors will be better. once again, the look itself is great, anchors are a HUGE downfall. Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2024 Color: Black Size: 16 Inches Verified Purchase The shelves are nice and easy to install. Exactly what you would expect. The only thing I would recommend is to replace the wall anchors that they come with. Get sturdier, higher quality wall anchors. I originally used the ones that came with the package and the shelves could bear significantly less weight than advertised... any amount of weight had them sagging out from the wall. If you use quality wall anchors and don't put anything too heavy on them, these shelves will serve you well. Color: White 1 1 option from $44.96 1 option from $44.96 Purchase options and add-ons Room Type NO Number of Shelves 1 Special Feature NO Product Dimensions 12.5"D x 16.9"W x 6.6"H Age Range (Description) NO Brand Trycooling Product Care Instructions Wipe with Dry Cloth Assembly Required Yes Recommended Uses For Product Living Room, Playroom, Nursery Number of Items 1 See more Material Polyvinyl Chloride Mounting Type Floor Mount Shelf Type NO Shape Rectangular About this item Pvc EXTRA LARGE STUFFED ANIMAL STORAGE: Large capacity but space-save design,elevate your toy storage with the stuffed animal zoo storage cage. Holds a ton of stuffed animals! With dimensions of 56.6 x 19.3 x 13 inches, the stuffed animal zoo storage can hold more than 50 plush toys with ease. Prefer for those medium to large stuffs. No more tripping over toys and stepping on plushies. HIGH QUALITY & LONG USE: Made with thickened PVC material and flexible elastic white rope access around the holder, it is not easy to deform, 2 layers large capacity design to increase storage space. Its sturdy construction and rounded corner design make sure it won't tip over. TIGHT JOINTS THAT DON'T POP OFF: We upgraded the material and adjusted the mould so that it can be used for a long time without deformation, and free accessories are included for use. QUICK AND EASY ASSEMBLY AND INSTALLATION: This versatile plush storage set is easy and simple. The bungee cords come pre threaded for easy assembly! Detailed installation instructions and all hardware are included. PERFECT STUFFED ANIMAL DISPLAY: This stuff animal organizer is perfect for Christmas, birthdays and holidays. It's simple to move around, suitable for playroom, bedroom, kids room, living room, nursery, preschool. To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. Forestry practices Made with materials from well-managed forests, recycled materials, and/or other controlled wood sources. As certified by The Forest Stewardship Council The Forest Stewardship Council The Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) supports responsible forestry, which is a vital solution to combat climate change. Choosing FSC-certified products –  whether furniture, building materials, paper, rubber, or textiles – helps protect forests, wildlife, clean water and supports the Indigenous Peoples, forest workers and communities who depend on them. Choosing FSC-certified  products can also help to mitigate climate change by supporting responsible management of the world’s forests. For a better  future, choose FSC. This rolling cabinet can be fixed beside or under desk. The sleek and modern finish is an easy fit for office or home study. Multifunctional & Stylish: Large wooden top and sturdy steel frame, this office cabinet can also be used as a printer stand with enough space for additional paper or documents, or as a living room storage cabinet. Ample Workspace & Open Storage: Bottom drawer is designed for hanging letter/A4 size file folders, while the central drawer provide large storage for office essentials. Open shelf make a great space for additional storage and display of items like printer, printer paper, knick-knack, photos of your favorite. Easy to Move: Rolling on 4 wheels, this mobile file cabinet can fix or move around your home office freely. Built-in brakes on front 2 casters to keep it in position and add stability. Unique fabric drawer design makes it only weigh 22 lbs. and light to move. Easy Assembly: Sturdy steel frame with wooden desktop and fabric drawer, provide strong support for storage while easy to assemble, spare time from putting together a lot of pieces with all tools and instruction included. Sustainability features This product has sustainability features recognized by trusted certifications. Forestry practices Made with materials from well-managed forests, recycled materials, and/or other controlled wood sources. As certified by The Forest Stewardship Council The Forest Stewardship Council The Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) supports responsible forestry, which is a vital solution to combat climate change. Choosing FSC-certified products –  whether furniture, building materials, paper, rubber, or textiles – helps protect forests, wildlife, clean water and supports the Indigenous Peoples, forest workers and communities who depend on them. Choosing FSC-certified  products can also help to mitigate climate change by supporting responsible management of the world’s forests. For a better  future, choose FSC. To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. More Hide Thank you for your feedback Close Sorry, there was an error Close Sorry we couldn't load the review Try again Sort reviews by Top reviews Most recent Top reviews Top reviews from the United States There was a problem filtering reviews right now. Please try again later. Bernadette Rosenstiel, D.C. 5.0 out of 5 stars An excellent peoduct, better than expected! Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023 Color: Light Grey Verified Purchase I first purchased the DEVAISE 3 a few weeks ago, and was so happy with it that I decided to also buy the singe-tower DEVAISE 2. As good as the assembly and product hardare were with the “3” model, the “2” was even better (better bag labeling, with extra screws, etc. in the event of a mishap or missing piece). The quality for all of the components is very good and everything was conscientiously labeled and accounted for. I’ve bought my share of self-assembly tables and file cabs over the years, including a ton of Ikea products, for home and business, but I must say that this line is hands down the most impressive I’ve seen to date. Both tables were smartly packaged to avoid shipping damage, and promptly delivered with Amazon Prime. More importantly, the directions were accurate and relatively easy to follow. At 75 years, my eyes aren’t what they used to be, but the quality of printing allowed me to double-check myself with a magnifying glass. As with many off-shore assembly guides, the text and written instructions were minimal, but the illustrations alone were clear and fairly easy to follow. Assembly took about an hour, slightly less on the smaller “2”. A couple of simple tools were provided, but as I have carpal tunnel, I used an electric screwdriver on several of the assembly steps to be able to tighten the various nuts and bolts appropriately. I also used a couple of regular screwdrivers. The engineering of these units is simple, efficient and well...to use that word again...smart. The finished tables are quite sturdy for home office use, as intended. These folks know what they are doing. I did manage to over-tighten a couple of shelf screws on the “2”, slightly cracking on shelf. Just enough to reach out to their support, and I will update this post with the results. Lightweight, study, attractive and relatively easy to assemble. All in all, I would absolutely recommend this line of home-office tables and file cabinets! Read more Bernadette Rosenstiel, D.C. 5.0 out of 5 stars An excellent peoduct, better than expected! Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023 I first purchased the DEVAISE 3 a few weeks ago, and was so happy with it that I decided to also buy the singe-tower DEVAISE 2. As good as the assembly and product hardare were with the “3” model, the “2” was even better (better bag labeling, with extra screws, etc. in the event of a mishap or missing piece). The quality for all of the components is very good and everything was conscientiously labeled and accounted for. I’ve bought my share of self-assembly tables and file cabs over the years, including a ton of Ikea products, for home and business, but I must say that this line is hands down the most impressive I’ve seen to date. Both tables were smartly packaged to avoid shipping damage, and promptly delivered with Amazon Prime. More importantly, the directions were accurate and relatively easy to follow. At 75 years, my eyes aren’t what they used to be, but the quality of printing allowed me to double-check myself with a magnifying glass. As with many off-shore assembly guides, the text and written instructions were minimal, but the illustrations alone were clear and fairly easy to follow. Assembly took about an hour, slightly less on the smaller “2”. A couple of simple tools were provided, but as I have carpal tunnel, I used an electric screwdriver on several of the assembly steps to be able to tighten the various nuts and bolts appropriately. I also used a couple of regular screwdrivers. The engineering of these units is simple, efficient and well...to use that word again...smart. The finished tables are quite sturdy for home office use, as intended. These folks know what they are doing. I did manage to over-tighten a couple of shelf screws on the “2”, slightly cracking on shelf. Just enough to reach out to their support, and I will update this post with the results. Lightweight, study, attractive and relatively easy to assemble. All in all, I would absolutely recommend this line of home-office tables and file cabinets! Images in this review Helpful Report Alisha 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, versatile Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2024 Color: Rustic Brown Wood Grain Print Verified Purchase Use this as a small table in my therapy practice. The wood gets gouged easily during drawing on it. Small, easy to assemble and looks nice Read more One person found this helpful Helpful Report Robert W 4.0 out of 5 stars Good For Modest Home Use Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2023 Color: Black Verified Purchase Item has a steel frame which makes it sturdier than expected from something that uses cloth and cardboard for drawers.  Sill, those materials make it lightweight and easy to move around. Plywood top sturdy enough for all-in-one printer/copier.  The file drawer seems adequate for light, hanging file home use, but it probably wouldn't hold up to office type stuffed files. This is a typical Chinese flat box furniture do it yourself in "13 steps" project with the usual flimsy tools and not much in the way of English instructions.  However, the pictures are pretty good for Chinese instructions, with a couple of expanded view inserts. Also, you get extra screws and nuts for the very real possibility of dropping and losing one of the small pieces.  Unless you have size extra small hands, putting the sliders on the drawers will require a pair of pliers to hold the very small fasteners.  Overall though, assembly is not bad for a Chinese flat box project, and one should be able to get it done in 1-3 hours, depending on experience with similar items. Unique slot design could hold tablet, cell phones and manage cables, pens, clips, and other office supplies. UPGRADED PRODUCT DIMENSION: This monitor stand riser maximum 40.9 inch in length, holds up to 55 lbs, both increased by 15%. This dual monitor riser brings you a more convenient home and office life. ADJUSTABLE LENGTH&ANGLE: Freely adjust the angle as you need. The length can be adjusted from the minimum 29.13 inch to the maximum 40.9 inch. This dual monitor riser could help you to form a comfortable sitting position and gain a better viewing experience. ERGONOMIC DOUBLE MONITOR RISER: Raise your monitor by 3.9", helping you to keep a good sitting posture and prevent the possible stress on neck, back and shoulder during your long time of work. LARGE DESK ORGANIZER: Lift your monitors by the desktop shelf, provides three storage spaces underneath to organize your office supplies and accessories like keyboards, office files, notebook, calculator. To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. Read more View Image Gallery Amazon Customer 5.0 out of 5 stars Images in this review Reviews with images See all photos Previous page Next page All photos Amazon Customer 4 out of 5 stars Versatile Solution for Dual Monitors Arrived quickly and while setup was a little tedious it was worth it. I have a small corner desk and neither of my dual monitors can be heightened leading to some neck issues. I needed a solution to increase my monitor height while also providing additional organization space for my small home office. This product filled both needs. My monitors are now a little above eye level, and the space underneath provides more storage space. I like the phone tray on each, for my phone or whichever pen I'm using at the moment. Definitely recommend. Please try again later. th_crnp 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Monitor Stand! Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2024 Color: Black Verified Purchase This monitor stand accomplished all I needed it to. It elevates my monitor for more comfort, provides extra storage space on top as well as below, and is moveable which allows for better organization on my desk. The side sections can be installed so that they pivot or can be pulled out and pushed in. It was quick and easy to put together and is lightweight. Read more Helpful Report Crystal Thompson 5.0 out of 5 stars Does it for me! Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024 Color: Black Verified Purchase I needed something to lift these screens up to eye level. With my monitor and laptop just sitting on the table alone, my posture was suffering. When looking down at the screens, It's like my body involuntarily wants to lean in closer to them, thus causing me to have that unsightly hump in my back. That's a no go! Even with looking at the measurements of the stands before buying them, i wasn't sure if three inches lifted off the table would be enough. I was pleasantly surprised once assembled. It was just enough to keep me from leaning forward. I think the nice little storage spaces underneath are nice too. Turned my table into a nice little workstation :) Assembly was easy, took about 20 -30 mins. May even take you less time honestly. Not much to put together. I saw in a review of the wood cracking where you are to screw the pieces together. That person must have really put a lot of force into over tightening because the individual pieces are tough. Don't over tighten and you should not have any problems. Functionality- As i said before, it puts the screens at eye level for me. I guess this also depends on the height of your own desk/table, your height, and the height of your chair. There's also the two swivel pieces that are to enable the swivel function should you choose to install them. I preferred not to install them as installing them will limit how far you can adjust the length of the stands. Not installing them has not diminished the integrity of the stands in any way and they can still "swivel". It's sturdy so far and i don't see it falling apart anytime soon. I included a picture using one of the slots for an ipad so you can see how it looks but i haven't used it for that until writing this review. I'd recommend. Inexpensive. Easy to assembly. Does not feel cheap. Does what it advertises. No more hunchback for me! Read more Crystal Thompson 5.0 out of 5 stars Does it for me! Images in this review Helpful Report Laura G 5.0 out of 5 stars Raised my monitors and organized my desk Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2024 Color: Black Verified Purchase I bought this because I liked the idea of not only getting my monitors to a better height, but because it offered storage. I have a set up that lets me switch from my work laptop to my personal tower-style PC using the same monitors (I use an HDMI 4x2 switch to save me from having to crawl under the desk). When I'm working, my personal keyboard and mouse can be tucked away neatly but still accessible if I want to game on my lunch or right after work. There's space for my HDMI switch and more counter space for my calendar, phone charger, etc. My cables are out of sight and out of my way. I like how much this raises my monitors. One is pretty old and doesn't go up and down anymore and it's nice to only need one dictionary instead of a pile of them. I work hybrid and use my own monitors to extend my work computer. When I'm not working, I use the same monitors for my personal computer. The space underneath allows me to store the peripherals for whichever computer I'm not using along with my HDMI 4x2 switch, my glasses, and other bits and bobs that would take up space on my desk. I like the rail for my phone (though it doesn't fit my iPad) and the extra counter space for my calendar, soundbar and clock. It was easy to assemble (think a really small IKEA book shelf) and I like the stability of the metal pegs keeping the three platforms together. If you have a smaller space, you won't be able to use the pegs, but it still feels very solid. Much more solid than books piled up to raise my monitor. Images in this review 3 people found this helpful Helpful Report Jenn C. 3.0 out of 5 stars Great height...flawed product Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2024 Color: Black Verified Purchase I just started a new job and needed a stand for my monitors. The height if this stand is perfect makes 8 hours of viewing much more comfortable. Assembly went smoothly until I noticed that one of the holes for the dowels was not cut. It was, however, marked so it was east to drill. The last and most unfortunate miss on this setup is that both of the monitor stand portions have the slot for the tablet/phone holder on the same side, so I cam only use holder. I decided to keep because the holder is the only real issue, but it is disappointing. Color: Clear/Grey 2 options from $175.99 2 options from $109.99 2 options from $119.99 2 options from $135.99 Purchase options and add-ons Brand MoNiBloom Product Dimensions 23.5"D x 41.5"W x 31"H Color Clear/Grey Style Modern Base Material Alloy Steel Finish Type Brushed Special Feature Adjustable Room Type Office, Bedroom, Living Room, Study Room Recommended Uses For Product Drafting Mounting Type Floor Mount See more Shape Rectangular Desk design Drafting Table Top Material Type Tempered Glass Number of Drawers 2 About this item Toughened Glass Desktop - This toughened glass desktop is a durable and strong portable drafting table, art desk, drawing table or artist desk. It features filleted edges and rounded corners to prevent undesired injury or damage during moving and using. It can combine with a light to turn this drafting table into a light table, making it great for tracing and comic creation. Adjustable Desktop Angle - The angle of the glass desktop of this adjustable drawing table can be adjusted from 0 to 65° to meet your different needs. A pencil ledge on the bottom of the tabletop helps hold papers and stationery when the desktop is tilted. It is versatile and can be used as a computer table or writing table for drawing or working. Large Storage Space - This art table has 4 embedded stationery trays on both sides that can be freely arranged, several honeycomb pen holes and slots in different sizes on the trays help organize stationery and tools. Moreover, two layers of non-woven cloth drawers on the right can be pulled out silently, providing ample storage space. More Stable - This drafting table has a steel tube frame structure with reinforced bottom frame and T-shaped legs, providing optimal stability and durability. The table remains stable and secure, providing a safe and reliable workspace for creative projects. Versatile Art Desk - Not only does this drafting table work as an art drawing desk, diamond painting desk but also as a normal computer table or writing table. It is perfect for art, drafting, and creative tasks in the office, studio, or at home. 4 Swivel Casters + 4 Rubber Feet - This portable drafting table comes with 4 360° swivel casters for flexible mobility, 2 with brakes for easy locking of the table in position. The other 4 rubber feet will prevent it from destroying the floor, especially on wooden floors. Easy to Clean - No more worries about spilled paint, coffee or pen marks as the tempered glass top and waterproof powder-coated metal stand of this drawing desk can be easily cleaned with a damp cloth and mild cleanser. › See more product details Additional Details Small Business Shop products from small business brands sold in Amazon’s store. To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. Read more View Image Gallery Amazon Customer 5.0 out of 5 stars Images in this review Reviews with images See all photos Previous page Next page All photos Amazon Customer 5 out of 5 stars Took a full day to assemble I got it assembled by myself.  I need to tell you something about me.  I am 93 years old.  It was a challenge to assemble, and I managed to get the top half done and I assembled the bottom half as well. However, I have a painful back so I couldn’t lift the top onto the bottom without assistance from a friend.  He lifted the desk onto the frame and it was a joy to realize that I actually did it!  Now I have a few Suggs for the manufacturer:  The storage on the right will dump all the contents onto the floor when the table is lifted to a slope.  One needs to remove all the contents first and when adjusting the slope, one must lift the entire table all the way to full extent, then lowere it down to where you need it.  I also find the small shelf/basket under the desk is pretty useless because one needs to lean way down or stand on one’s head in order to see what is on the shelf.  Other than these issues, I am very glad I purchased the desk.  I use it for painting watercolors and now have a place to work and not have to use my dining table.  I think it is very well designed and is very sturdy.  I like the side extension on the left to put my pallet and instead of lifting the top up and down, I use a small easel ifI want to put my drawing board at an angle.  I am very glad that I purchased this product. Images in this review 2 people found this helpful Helpful Report Gary Breton 4.0 out of 5 stars Extremely high quality Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2024 Color: Natural/Black Verified Purchase This is an excellent product well designed and well made with high quality. Unfortunately, I am missing item 33 and Amazon cannot send replacement parts . Read more Helpful Report Customer Review 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for Diamond Painting & Paint by Number Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024 Color: Clear/Grey Verified Purchase Very happy with this drafting table. I use it mainly for diamond painting and paint by number. It’s great for painting because the top is glass and any paint can be easily washed or scraped off without damaging the tabletop. My diamond painting light pad also likes the glass surface as well and the non slip feet stay firmly in place even when tilted fairly steep. I don't use the drawers because for my needs, I have a roller drawer bin that I pull up right next to me with most of my supplies inside and the drawers were not going to be able to hold all my stuff. I also found that the drawers were more in the way of my legs and chair, prohibiting me from being seated in the middle of the table so I removed them completely. I like the side holders but I only installed them on the right side- Im right handed- and its perfect for holding tweezers, scissors, washi tape and brushes but I left it off the left side so I can use my clip light along that side easier- the bracket just gets in the way otherwise. I use mine in my dining room and I appreciate it having wheels so I can move it easily to another room when we have company. The tilt function is easy to use although unless Im doing something wrong, needs to be tilted all the way up in order to put it back down to start over. When you have work already attached to the table and tools in the side pocket, that is not an ideal situation. Not a deal breaker but more of an inconvenience. I use this table for hours at a time and it is one of my two best purchases for my crafting needs. Assembly was fairly quick and easy but make certain you pay attention to which way the front is facing in instructions so the sides are correct since one is different than the other due to the drawers. Also don't fully tighten the screws until the end, have some play, otherwise it can end up wonky and more difficult to assemble.  I did have some trouble getting all the screws through when putting on the glass top but I managed to get them all in. Theres a little foam pad on the underside to protect the glass but it blocks the screw hole ( some we not pre poked open & the screws didn't know where to go ) so I used a sharp screw to poke the holes open from underneath and then used the machine screws that came with the table to complete the attachment. Overall very happy with this table and would absolutely purchase from them again. It's not worth buying if itema are coming rusted and bent. I'm very disappointed. Color: Rustic Size: 39 inch 39 inch 47 inch Purchase options and add-ons Brand MINOSYS Product Dimensions 17.8"D x 39"W x 29.5"H Color Rustic Style Modern Base Material Storage Finish Type Wood Special Feature Unlit Room Type Office Recommended Uses For Product Face Makeup Mounting Type Floor Mount See more Shape Rectangular Desk design Computer Desk Top Material Type Engineered Wood Number of Drawers 3 About this item Computer Desk For Multifunction: This computer desk is simple but practical that allows you to work, write, and type in a comfortable and organized way. It's perfect use as a computer desk, office desk, writing table, gaming desk, makeup desk, console table. Multi-Functional Monitor Stand: This modern computer desk has an incredible multi-functional monitor stand. The size of this desk monitor stand allows you to have two monitors at the same level. This computer desk with monitor shelf not only allow you to have more storage space on the desktop and raises your screen for improved visibility, but also you can install the monitor stand under the desk to turn this monitor stand into an under table bookshelf. Reversible Storage Shelves: This gaming table with a monitor stand has two spacious and adjustable open shelves for storage. This desk with shelves is reversible that can be installed on either left or right. The adjustable shelf of computer desk allows you to store different sizes of stuff, such as computer hosts, books, office stationeries, and small devices. The reversible open shelf design of the office desk keeps everything easy to reach and organize. Modern Industrial Feature: This home office desk with storage has a large piece of high-end MDF board with the popular rustic brown walnut veneers, a high-quality contrasting stainless steel base in Rustic Black matte black writing desk creates a special modern industrial charm that can easily match any style of home or office furniture. Scratch Resistance Surface: The home office desk top is made of medium-density fiberboard with two layers of a glossy finish which gives a smooth and high-end classic outlook to the work desk and this finish provides a great waterproof surface and scratch resistance. The adjustable footpads on the bottom can keep the desk stable on the uneven floor and prevent you scratch the floor by moving this wood computer desk. › See more product details Additional Details Small Business Shop products from small business brands sold in Amazon’s store. Amazon Customer 5.0 out of 5 stars I love my new desk Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2024 Color: Rustic Size: 47 inch Verified Purchase As an avid crafter and someone who spends considerable time at my computer, finding the right desk is crucial for both comfort and functionality. The MINOSYS Gaming/Computer Desk caught my eye with its unique design, compact size, and promise of versatility. Here's my review: Design and Style: The MINOSYS desk boasts a rustic charm that sets it apart from traditional gaming or computer desks. Its sleek yet minimalist design fits well in a variety of room settings, adding a touch of sophistication to any space. The addition of a monitor stand not only elevates the aesthetic appeal but also provides ergonomic benefits by ensuring the screen is at eye level, reducing neck strain during long gaming or work sessions. Despite its compact size, this desk offers ample surface area for my paints, brushes, goops, sprays and other accessories. The desk features a sturdy construction that can support the weight of multiple projects or vigorous crafting without wobbling or instability. Assembly of the desk was straightforward, thanks to clear instructions and well-labeled parts. The quality of materials used is evident, with durable construction that feels solid and reliable. The desk's rustic finish adds character while providing resistance to scratches and wear, ensuring long-lasting durability even with regular use. In my opinion the MINOSYS Gaming/Computer Desk is a stylish and functional addition to any crafting workspace. Its compact size make it a versatile option for gamers, students, or professionals alike. Its simplicity, durability, and ergonomic benefits make it a worthy investment for anyone in need of a reliable and attractive workstation. This rolling cabinet can be fixed beside or under desk. The sleek and modern finish is an easy fit for office or home study. Multifunctional & Stylish: Large wooden top and sturdy steel frame, this office cabinet can also be used as a printer stand with enough space for additional paper or documents, or as a living room storage cabinet. Forestry practices Made with materials from well-managed forests, recycled materials, and/or other controlled wood sources. As certified by The Forest Stewardship Council The Forest Stewardship Council The Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) supports responsible forestry, which is a vital solution to combat climate change. Choosing FSC-certified products –  whether furniture, building materials, paper, rubber, or textiles – helps protect forests, wildlife, clean water and supports the Indigenous Peoples, forest workers and communities who depend on them. Choosing FSC-certified  products can also help to mitigate climate change by supporting responsible management of the world’s forests. For a better  future, choose FSC. To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. More Hide Thank you for your feedback Close Sorry, there was an error Close Sorry we couldn't load the review Try again Sort reviews by Top reviews Most recent Top reviews Top reviews from the United States There was a problem filtering reviews right now. Please try again later. Bernadette Rosenstiel, D.C. 5.0 out of 5 stars An excellent peoduct, better than expected! Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023 Color: Light Grey Verified Purchase I first purchased the DEVAISE 3 a few weeks ago, and was so happy with it that I decided to also buy the singe-tower DEVAISE 2. As good as the assembly and product hardare were with the “3” model, the “2” was even better (better bag labeling, with extra screws, etc. in the event of a mishap or missing piece). The quality for all of the components is very good and everything was conscientiously labeled and accounted for. I’ve bought my share of self-assembly tables and file cabs over the years, including a ton of Ikea products, for home and business, but I must say that this line is hands down the most impressive I’ve seen to date. Both tables were smartly packaged to avoid shipping damage, and promptly delivered with Amazon Prime. More importantly, the directions were accurate and relatively easy to follow. At 75 years, my eyes aren’t what they used to be, but the quality of printing allowed me to double-check myself with a magnifying glass. As with many off-shore assembly guides, the text and written instructions were minimal, but the illustrations alone were clear and fairly easy to follow. Assembly took about an hour, slightly less on the smaller “2”. A couple of simple tools were provided, but as I have carpal tunnel, I used an electric screwdriver on several of the assembly steps to be able to tighten the various nuts and bolts appropriately. I also used a couple of regular screwdrivers. The engineering of these units is simple, efficient and well...to use that word again...smart. The finished tables are quite sturdy for home office use, as intended. These folks know what they are doing. I did manage to over-tighten a couple of shelf screws on the “2”, slightly cracking on shelf. Just enough to reach out to their support, and I will update this post with the results. Lightweight, study, attractive and relatively easy to assemble. All in all, I would absolutely recommend this line of home-office tables and file cabinets! Read more Bernadette Rosenstiel, D.C. 5.0 out of 5 stars An excellent peoduct, better than expected! Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023 I first purchased the DEVAISE 3 a few weeks ago, and was so happy with it that I decided to also buy the singe-tower DEVAISE 2. As good as the assembly and product hardare were with the “3” model, the “2” was even better (better bag labeling, with extra screws, etc. in the event of a mishap or missing piece). The quality for all of the components is very good and everything was conscientiously labeled and accounted for. I’ve bought my share of self-assembly tables and file cabs over the years, including a ton of Ikea products, for home and business, but I must say that this line is hands down the most impressive I’ve seen to date. Both tables were smartly packaged to avoid shipping damage, and promptly delivered with Amazon Prime. More importantly, the directions were accurate and relatively easy to follow. At 75 years, my eyes aren’t what they used to be, but the quality of printing allowed me to double-check myself with a magnifying glass. As with many off-shore assembly guides, the text and written instructions were minimal, but the illustrations alone were clear and fairly easy to follow. Assembly took about an hour, slightly less on the smaller “2”. A couple of simple tools were provided, but as I have carpal tunnel, I used an electric screwdriver on several of the assembly steps to be able to tighten the various nuts and bolts appropriately. I also used a couple of regular screwdrivers. The engineering of these units is simple, efficient and well...to use that word again...smart. The finished tables are quite sturdy for home office use, as intended. These folks know what they are doing. I did manage to over-tighten a couple of shelf screws on the “2”, slightly cracking on shelf. Just enough to reach out to their support, and I will update this post with the results. Lightweight, study, attractive and relatively easy to assemble. All in all, I would absolutely recommend this line of home-office tables and file cabinets! Images in this review Helpful Report Alisha 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, versatile Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2024 Color: Rustic Brown Wood Grain Print Verified Purchase Use this as a small table in my therapy practice. The wood gets gouged easily during drawing on it. Small, easy to assemble and looks nice Read more One person found this helpful Helpful Report Robert W 4.0 out of 5 stars Good For Modest Home Use Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2023 Color: Black Verified Purchase Item has a steel frame which makes it sturdier than expected from something that uses cloth and cardboard for drawers.  Sill, those materials make it lightweight and easy to move around. Plywood top sturdy enough for all-in-one printer/copier.  The file drawer seems adequate for light, hanging file home use, but it probably wouldn't hold up to office type stuffed files. This is a typical Chinese flat box furniture do it yourself in "13 steps" project with the usual flimsy tools and not much in the way of English instructions.  However, the pictures are pretty good for Chinese instructions, with a couple of expanded view inserts. Also, you get extra screws and nuts for the very real possibility of dropping and losing one of the small pieces.  Unless you have size extra small hands, putting the sliders on the drawers will require a pair of pliers to hold the very small fasteners.  Overall though, assembly is not bad for a Chinese flat box project, and one should be able to get it done in 1-3 hours, depending on experience with similar items. To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. Anik Datta 5.0 out of 5 stars Adds a modern touch while providing a comfortable backrest Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2024 Color: Dark Grey Size: Queen Style: Modern Verified Purchase The Allewie Upholstered Queen Size Platform Bed Frame with 4 Storage Drawers is an outstanding choice for anyone seeking both style and practicality in their bedroom. Its elegant design, featuring a tufted headboard, adds a modern touch while providing a comfortable backrest for reading or relaxing. The four storage drawers are a significant advantage, offering ample space to keep your bedroom organized and clutter-free. Many users appreciate the sturdy construction, which combines metal and wood, ensuring durability and stability for a restful night's sleep. Additionally, the easy assembly process allows you to set it up quickly, making it a convenient option for busy individuals or families. Overall, this bed frame is highly praised for its blend of functionality and aesthetic appeal, making it a fantastic addition to any home. Read more 7 people found this helpful Helpful Report Amazon Customer 5.0 out of 5 stars Pleasantly surprise for the price! Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2024 Color: Light Grey Size: Queen Style: Modern Verified Purchase I've put together a lot of furniture over the years.  This bed is sturdy!  The parts were good quality and the instructions easy to follow.  It only takes a single included allen wrench to assemble.  The wrench could be better to ease assembly but its a one time use and then thrown away.  The fit and finish is good.  While the headboard isn't grand or plush, it simple and elegant.  Once completely assembled the bed is sturdy.  At first the wood slats seem undersized, but once the mattress is on I couldn't tell.  It would take an adult to jump up and down on the mattress to possibly break it.  Don't plan on putting heavy items in the drawers as they are wire baskets on wheels.  They are great for winter clothes, wrapping paper, spare linens etc..  I'm using this bed in a guest room.  It would be great for kids/teen bedrooms and if your on a budget the master bedroom.  5 for sturdiness, style, and assembly.  4 on the drawers.  This is a post assembly review, not a long term review. Read more 18 people found this helpful Helpful Report Justin 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice bed Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2024 Color: Light Grey Size: King Style: Antique Verified Purchase We purchased this as a Prime Day deal. We've wanted a bed like this for a long time, but were hoping we'd find one that wasn't a platform bed. We couldn't pass up the deal on this, so went ahead and ordered it. Installation wasn't hard at all. The bed is very sturdy and eye appealing. My main downfall is the drawers. They seem very flimsy and get stuck...a lot. Other than that, great bed! Read more 5 people found this helpful Helpful Report Natasha A Kurtz 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality, Very Happy Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2024 Color: Light Grey Size: Queen Style: Antique Verified Purchase Assembled and started using this a few days ago, and I'm so happy with it. The frame itself is super sturdy and stable, all metal pieces and thick screws/bolts, with very precise dimensions not allowing it to wiggle around at all, so it's squeak-free so far. Every piece was labeled and the instructions pamphlet was easy to follow, with all the screws and other tiny pieces very well-packaged and labeled as well. The cloth on the headboard, footboard and draws is soft and decent quality. The gray is bit better-looking in person than in the photos, it should be pretty versatile to work with your decor. Pros: - very solid, sturdy - easy-ish assembly (lot of steps, but easy-to-follow instructions) - very, very high quality for the price - great engineering Cons: - it's super heavy when assembled, you will likely have to disassemble it to move it to another home - the wooden support slats use thick plastic pegs instead of bolts to attach to the frame; the pegs may dry-rot over time and need to be replaced with bolts Summary: I'm super happy with this purchase, and honestly think it will be worth the disassembly and reassembly for our next move. If it suits your fashion, I highly recommend. The drawers are so nice to have and work well. Nice color. Read more 2 people found this helpful Helpful Report All The Shopping Deals 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegance Meets Practicality! Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2024 Color: Dark Grey Size: King Style: Modern Verified Purchase I recently upgraded to the Allewie Upholstered King Size Platform Bed Frame with 4 Storage Drawers and Headboard, and it has exceeded all expectations, earning a solid 5-star rating. This bed frame seamlessly blends style with functionality, providing a luxurious sleeping space with added storage convenience. Design and Construction: The upholstered headboard adds a touch of sophistication, creating a focal point in the bedroom. The neutral color complements various decor styles, allowing for easy integration into any room. The quality of the upholstery is evident, providing both comfort and durability. Storage Drawers: The four spacious storage drawers integrated into the bed frame are a game-changer for those seeking additional space in the bedroom. These drawers effortlessly slide in and out, offering a discreet and organized solution for storing extra linens, clothing, or personal items. The design ensures that the drawers are seamlessly integrated, maintaining the overall aesthetic appeal of the bed. Sturdiness and Support: The platform design eliminates the need for a box spring, providing excellent support for the mattress. The construction is robust, and the bed frame feels solid and secure. Even with the added storage drawers, there is no compromise on stability. Easy Assembly: One notable feature is the straightforward assembly process. The instructions are clear, and all necessary tools are provided. The bed frame came together seamlessly, and I appreciated the attention to detail in the assembly instructions. Overall Comfort: Beyond its practical features, the Allewie bed frame offers a comfortable and inviting sleeping space. The padded headboard provides a supportive surface for sitting up and reading or watching TV. In conclusion, the Allewie Upholstered King Size Platform Bed Frame has transformed my bedroom into a stylish and organized sanctuary. It's a perfect blend of elegance and practicality, and the added storage drawers are a true asset. If you're in search of a high-quality, functional, and aesthetically pleasing bed frame, look no further. Highly recommended! With a high-quality motor, our adjustable desk operates quietly at less than 55dB and can be used with confidence even in the quietest room. 【Precise & Stable Adjustment】Designed to cater to your needs, our stand up desk design features an LED display and 3 memory presets, helping you make precise and quick adjustments. The robust wooden desktop and the T-shaped steel frame ensure maximum stability and can hold up to 176 lbs. 【Suitable for Daily Use】 Stay organized with our sit stand desk which comes equipped with 2 hooks on either side and 2 wire collecting holes on the desktop, making it an easy and convenient option for daily use. The eco-friendly wood is sleek, easy to clean, and odor-free. 【More Choices】Our stand up desk is available in a range of colors and sizes, making it an ideal choice for a computer desk, writing desk and more. Whether it's in your living room, study, bedroom, or any other space, it's always a great addition. 【Easy Assembly】The package includes a height adjustable desk, an instruction manual, and necessary tools for assembly. You can easily put it together using our installation video. S for "Superior", M for "Manufacture",U for "Using",G for "Good" SMUG Standing Desk Next page Product Description Electric Adjustable Standing Desk 2 Splicing Boards The tabletop of the table is composed of two separate boards that require assembly before installation. Despite the need for joining the two pieces, the resulting structure is still very sturdy. Anti-Collision Technology Computer Desk has advanced automatic anti-collision technology, which can prevent collision or conflict when detecting obstacles during movement. 2 Wire Holes The desktop is equipped with two wire holes, which help to store the wires and make your desktop more neat and tidy. 2 Hooks The standing desk is equipped with two hooks on the side, you can place headphones, backpacks, and other items. To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. Read more View Image Gallery Amazon Customer 5.0 out of 5 stars Images in this review Reviews with images See all photos Previous page Next page All photos Amazon Customer 4 out of 5 stars As advertised! (With a few minor cosmetic issues) I only docked one star because of the cosmetic issues as it was fresh out of the box and already had some paint chips and a small dent on the underside of the desktop. These are very minor, and arent really visible once all assembled, but still kind of upsetting for it being a brand new deskThe instructions were very easy to read, except for one part, where it says to rotate clockwise to make the right leg go down. If you are following the orientation shown in the drawing, you should turn counter clockwise to make the left leg go down. It was easy to figure out, so no biggie. Aside from that, everything was very clear and there were even extras of each screw included! The steps and images are simple and clear.The mechanism works wonderfully, granted it has only been 1 hour since I have started using it. As far as noise goes, it kind of sounds like if your neighbor was vaccuming. So its not noisy at all, but also not completely silent. You wouldnt be bothering your roommate in the next bedroom, but might annoy someone you are sharing a bedroom with.The presets are easy to set.Something to note is that the table for the motor is attached to the motor. Seems like common sense, but I spent 10 minutes looking for this extra cable until I realized its already on the motor, and thats why it wasnt in the "included" list haha.I got the 48" white table for $110. It was delivered by FedEx and they rang my doorbell and dropped it off at my door for me! I was surprised since my entrance is kind of off to the side of my building and most people leave packages at the normal entrance - and i have to go outside and around to get them. I also had injured my foot recently, so this was really convinient. isnt something Amazon related, but compliments to the FedEx worker and props to the company for using FedEx to deliver their products!The table top feels durable.  I might cover it with a curtain just because im very particular about white things getting stained. Overall, for $110, im pleased! I will update my review once I get more time using it.I recommend this moving desk! I have 3 monitors with arm mounts and I think the weight of it makes it wobble.  I had the same setup on my 48”w, 1” thick desk and it didn’t budge.  The motor seems good and it has two hooks on either end which I like. This set comes with a screw driver of its own which is a nice touch but it didn’t last through the whole process and became stripped. Rip. Otherwise, after some gnarly grip and wrist workouts I got this put together. It’s HEAVY and well worth the effort so far. Read more 2 people found this helpful Helpful Report Breanna Zoey 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice desk so far! How to adjust uneven legs Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2024 Color: White Size: 48*24 WholePiece Verified Purchase The media could not be loaded. I really like this desk so far! Time will tell how well it holds up, though! I ordered the 48x24 one piece, and the desk table top came in perfect condition with no scratches or cracks. It was straightforward to set up following the instructions. I was surprised by how quiet the desk is when I raise or lower it,  and it moves super smoothly with about 20 lb of weight on it. After setting it up I noticed it was a little uneven, one leg was 1/3' lower than the other, not a big deal but I did one to remedy it. I'm uploading a video of how I evened out the legs in case it helps somebody else. Now the desk is perfectly level and I love it! I did email customer service to ask for the videos another reviewer said they had received which explained how to address the uneven leg situation, I can only upload one video to this review so I'm including my video, but the two short videos the company sent me were not all that helpful. I hope my video for evening out the legs helps somebody! So far so good, I think it's a great desk for the price but I'll update the review down the road if anything comes up. I do advise looking into and buying some sort of cable management product, after a setup I ordered a 15" cable management tray to clean everything up, as the desk does not come with any such thing. PUKAMI  cross legged armless chair no wheels PUKAMI Image Unavailable Image not available for Color: To view this video download Flash Player 20 VIDEOS VIDEOS 360° VIEW IMAGES DIMENSIONS View in Your Room PUKAMI Criss Cross Chair,Comfy Cross Legged Office Desk Chair No Wheels,Cute Makeup Vanity Chair,Fabric Modern Swivel Height Adjustable Mid Back Wide Seat Computer Task Chair for Home Office(Beige) Visit the PUKAMI Store 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 4,328 ratings Amazon's Choice highlights highly rated, well-priced products available to ship immediately. Amazon's Choice 2K+ bought in past month To see product details, add this item to your cart. You can always remove it later. Color: Beige Style: Classic Classic Traditional Contemporary Casual Modern Purchase options and add-ons Brand PUKAMI Color Beige Product Dimensions 20"D x 25.2"W x 34"H Size 20"D x 25.2"W x 34"H Back Style Solid Back Material Polyester Item Weight 25.3 Pounds Frame Material Metal Seat Material Type Foam About this item Stylish Desk Chair No Wheels: An elegant blend of comfort and style, the elimination of armrests and castors removes all unnecessary decoration, effortlessly matching any décor to create an impression of comfort and elegance, the unique black lacquered cross aluminium base with non-slip natural rubber feet attached to each support leg to prevent scratching and slipping, perfect for offices, bedrooms, studies, living rooms, dressing tables, parlours and dorm rooms. Wide & Soft Seat: This armless office chair has a widened seat so you can comfortably sit cross-legged or curl up in the chair. The backrest and seat are padded with high resilience foam and covered with twill fabric upholstery for a soft, skin-friendly, long sitting experience. In addition, the chair uses an SGS certified Class 3 gas lift that can hold up to 350 lbs. The wider cushion and premium gas lift provide you with long-lasting comfort. Ergonomic & Comfortable: The U-shaped design gradually releases the pressure on the back and hips from the middle to the sides, providing strong support for the back. The backrest and cushion are designed to fit the curve of the human spine, helping to adjust your sitting posture, reduce fatigue and injury caused by prolonged sitting and improve your work efficiency. Multi-Function: PUKAMI office chair with 5'' adjustable height, 360 degree swivel angle and 108°-130° tilt angle, whether for office or leisure, it provides you with the most comfortable height and angle. You can use the powerful lever to adjust the seat height or keep the backrest upright, and turn the knob under the seat to control the tilt tension. Easy To Assemble: The vanity chair comes with all the hardware and necessary tools, as well as detailed instructions. Assembling this office chair yourself in the office or at home is easy and takes only 15 minutes. › See more product details Customer ratings by feature Comfort 4.4 4.4 Easy to assemble 4.4 4.4 Support 4.1 4.1 Ergonomic 4.0 4.0 See all reviews Report an issue with this product or seller Frequently bought together This item: PUKAMI Criss Cross Chair,Comfy Cross Legged Office Desk Chair No Wheels,Cute Makeup Vanity Chair,Fabric Modern Swivel Height Adjustable Mid Back Wide Seat Computer Task Chair for Home Office(Beige) $55.99 $ 55 . 99 Get it Sep 20 - 23 In Stock Ships from and sold by PUKAMI. + SKYDUE 360 Degree Rotating Desk Organizer, Dual-Purpose Pencil Pen Holder for Desk, Rotating Desk Pen Organizer with 5 Slots, Art Supply, Pencil Cup for Office, School, Home $9.99 $ 9 . 99 Get it as soon as Sunday, Sep 22 In Stock Sold by Skydue and ships from Amazon Fulfillment. + Mr. Pen- Sticky Notes, 3”x3”, 12 Pads, Vintage Colors Sticky Notes, Sticky Note, Self-Stick Note Pads, Sticky Pads Sticky Notes Aesthetic, Colorful Sticky Notes, Sticky Notes Bulk Sticky Notes $7.85 $ 7 . 85 Get it as soon as Sunday, Sep 22 In Stock Sold by Mr. Pen and ships from Amazon Fulfillment. To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. Read more View Image Gallery Amazon Customer 5.0 out of 5 stars Images in this review Reviews with images See all photos Previous page Next page All photos Amazon Customer 5 out of 5 stars Best office chair I’ve been looking for a chair like this for a long time. I like the wide seat format that allows me to sit yogi-style crossed-leg. Has a nice swivel and rock. I kinda wish it had wheels but it’s not a big deal that it doesn’t. I got the beige because it was on sale and I like it but of course it isn’t very stain-forgiving. I work at our dining table and have two babies under two so, it was expected that we would have to deal with stains. Had the darker colors been on sale, I would have gone with one of those. I will definitely order again when the time comes. For now, it is holding up very well and is sturdy enough to hold a larger person. Easily adjustable and a very good value. I sit with it in the upright locked position but it does recline nicely. My husband put it together for me, he said it was easy to assemble. It is comfortable, fairly easy to assemble, and looks great. I love that it is wide enough to accommodate my fluff, and that I can easily sit cross-legged or in different positions. That said, it sounds like a freight train every time you move. If you work from home and can mute yourself on calls, it's fine, but if you have a shared office, be prepared for colleague retaliation. It's so big, spacious, and incredibly comfortable. Just like the reviews mentioned, it’s perfect for someone like me who loves to move around and sit cross-legged. No matter what position I sit or squat in, I never feel uncomfortable. It's an absolute winner! The only downside might be that it doesn’t have wheels, but since I prefer the chair to stay in one place most of the time, it actually works out well for me. Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2024 Color: Beige Style: Classic Verified Purchase I recently purchased the PUKAMI Criss Cross Chair, an armless cross-legged office desk chair, and I am extremely satisfied with my purchase. The chair is not only aesthetically pleasing with its unique criss-cross design, but it is also very comfortable to sit on for long periods of time. The seat is well-padded and offers great support for my back, allowing me to maintain good posture throughout the day. One of the standout features of this chair is its cross-legged design, which adds stability and style to my office space. The chair is also height-adjustable, allowing me to customize it to my preferred seating position. The PUKAMI Criss Cross Chair is made of high-quality materials, and the construction feels sturdy and durable. The chair is easy to assemble and the instructions provided were clear and concise. Overall, I highly recommend the PUKAMI Criss Cross Chair for anyone looking for a stylish and comfortable office desk chair. It has exceeded my expectations in terms of design, comfort, and durability. Read more 15 people found this helpful Helpful Report onyx1176 3.0 out of 5 stars Chair squeaks and pops and padding not very comfortable Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2024 Color: Beige Style: Traditional Verified Purchase There are many criss-cross chairs for sale on Amazon, with prices ranging from reasonable, $70-$80 to unreasonable, $100 or more. When I bought this chair for around $89, it seemed like a good deal compared to similar chairs. However, I have two main issues with the Pukami brand: the padding is quite hard, and the chair squeaks and pops whenever I move. I don't mind firm memory foam padding, but this padding is just plain hard with little give, and the noise comes from where the seat attaches to the gas lift. Another annoying issue is that the adjustable arm under the seat isn't secure. One time over the few days I sat in the chair, the arm slipped out of the locked position, causing the chair to lean back unexpectedly. This function should only activate when the arm is intentionally pulled out. This type of chair is very easy to assemble, and I don't think the issue is due to assembly, so I'm unsure if mine is defective or if this is a common problem with this brand. Despite these issues, it was still much better than the smaller chairs I had been using, so I decided to keep it. However, I needed another chair for my work desk and ended up buying an identical-looking criss-cross chair from another Amazon seller at a cheaper price. While these two chairs look alike, the difference is significant. The new chair has softer fabric, and doesn't squeak or pop when I move. With that said, I decided to give the Pukami chair to a family member and purchased another chair from the other seller for my work desk. I am glad I tried the criss-cross chairs; they are great and, if you pick the right brand, very comfortable and roomy. I highly recommend this style of chair, just not this vendor. In my experience, if you are looking for a chair because your current one is no longer working for you, any criss-cross chair is likely better than what you are currently sitting in. Read more 28 people found this helpful Helpful Report See more reviews Top reviews from other countries Denise Fortier 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable Reviewed in Canada on May 18, 2024 Color: Beige Style: Traditional Verified Purchase This chair is amazing! The extra wide seat and the wheels work great when working at multiple places. Great support for the lower back. To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. The seat cushion comes off and appears to have a zipper part to it, which I hope will come in handy and may be easy to wash, as this was purchased for my teenage son who is an absolutely filthy slob in regard to his bedroom.  Love the color. Only took 2 screws, which lines up perfectly. It's on carpet so it isn't too noisy, but I did roll it around the kitchen first and it didn't squeak at all. Upon first inspection, great product for the price! Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2024 Color: Black Verified Purchase I am pleased with this chair. I have been using it for over a week. Have not seen any wear problems. I use it when working with my computer. It rolls  very smoothly on our carpet. I typically spend 4 or more hours sitting in it each day. I was looking for a chair to sit in for 1-2 hours in at a time. Then get up and walk around. I was not looking for a chair to sit in nonstop all day or sleep in. I previously used a wooden chair, but it didn't have rollers. Sometimes I use this chair without the cushion. I do that when I want to walk around more frequently Seat is less comfortable, but the seat still works fine. I am 6'1", weigh 185 pounds and my pants legs size is 32 inches inseam. The back rest fits my back fine. I can adjust the height to work nicely with my legs. It was easy to assemble. Sustainable Materials Not only do engineered wood products begin life as a recycled product, but more than 95% of a tree can be used for the production of particleboard, versus 63% for solid lumber. A Proud Legacy Based in Jamestown, N.Y., Bush Furniture has been a leading manufacturer of ready-to-assemble furniture for over 60 years. Next page Is this product made from solid wood? Key West products are not solid wood. They are manufactured using engineered wood with a laminate finish. Is assembly required? Key West products do not arrive pre-assembled, but most items are designed for installation in 60 minutes or less. What if I'm missing parts/instructions? We aim to include all necessary materials with our products. If an item has been left out by mistake, our U.S.-based customer support team can help issue a replacement. Next page Upload your video Product Description Product Description A natural fit for homes that embrace coastal and farmhouse decor, the Bush Furniture Key West 2 Drawer Lateral File Cabinet is perfect for organizing paperwork in virtually any room. Two file drawers open on smooth full-extension ball bearing slides for an easy reach to legal and letter size documents. A unique X pattern accent on the drawer panels creates a relaxed style supported by a sturdy and attractive post leg design. This 30W x 20D x 30H lateral filing cabinet matches the height of any Key West Desk (sold separately) to create an extended work surface when placed side by side. Choose from a variety of casual finish options to find the perfect look for your space. The Key West Collection offers a wide variety of farmhouse furniture that makes building a complete home office or living room ensemble a breeze. This 2 drawer filing cabinet is tested to meet ANSI/SOHO quality standards for safety and performance and is backed by the Bush Furniture 1 Year Manufacturer's Warranty. See the full collection for coordinating items available. To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. Learn more how customers reviews work on Amazon Customers say Customers like the appearance and value of the cabinet. They mention it looks great, is well worth the money, and has a great color scheme. Some also like the size and functionality. However, some customers have different opinions on the build quality, ease of assembly, and material quality.
