Read more View Image Gallery Amazon Customer 5.0 out of 5 stars Images in this review Reviews with images See all photos Previous page Next page All photos Amazon Customer 5 out of 5 stars While instructions for building it could be better, the product itself is really solid and nice! I have been buying put-together furniture for over 2 decades and have learned to exclusively buy Sauder Furniture because of the quality pieces, customer service, and assembling instructions - the best in the market, IMHO. They even provide video. Unfortunately, the Sauder collection I've been purchasing to add to my studio in the last 10 years (Harbor View in Antique White) became discontinued and I needed a lateral file cabinet, I had to hunt for something in the same design genre. This led me to the Bush Furniture line, and I fell in love with this Linen White Oak finish, which is pretty close to what I already own.Upon arrival, I did the usual checking of parts (all good there), laid out all the pieces, sorted all the nails, screws, etc. into little Tupperware containers (my usual), got my tools, and got to work. I was dismayed though, at the less than great assembling instructions. Thank goodness I've done this many times and was able to figure out some of the steps on my own!  Some might not be able to get it so easily if they're not mechanically inclined or have simply not used this type of furniture you put together yourself.The main issue was the drawer "slides" (metal mechanisms that hold the drawers in place) - not easy to follow at all.  I had the entire thing put together except for the last steps of the slides on the drawers and realized I had to take them apart and re-assemble - something I've never had to do.As far as the quality, though, this thing is SOLID. I love the back of it being made from same material as the sides and top - something that Sauder could do better on some of their pieces.  I'm very happy with the result and look.I've already begun using it and one of the features that I really love is that the bottom drawer has a "catch" on the slides that has a satisfying click when you close it, and seems to help keep the whole unit from coming forward on you. I don't plan to load it down  Very satisfied with my purchase - just know that the building process is more laborious and tedious than it needs to be.One MAJOR thing to note, if this matters to you:  The hanging file folders are NOT side-by-side facing forward. That only works for one half  of each drawer, the way this is designed (see photos). That was disappointing. All the designers would've had to do is add about an inch to the "width" of this cabinet to accommodate forward facing file folders on both sides with two dividers in the middle (again, see photos).Final note:  I would recommend that BUSH Furniture create a couple of short videos on how to assemble  the trickier aspects like the metal slides, using the bolts, etc. Assembling furniture isn't always easy for the more difficult steps and would greatly enhance the customer experience. Thanks! More Hide Thank you for your feedback Close Sorry, there was an error Close Sorry we couldn't load the review Try again Sort reviews by Top reviews Most recent Top reviews Top reviews from the United States There was a problem filtering reviews right now. Please try again later. Debra Hart Studio 5.0 out of 5 stars While instructions for building it could be better, the product itself is really solid and nice! Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2024 Color: Linen White Oak Pattern Name: File Cabinet Verified Purchase I have been buying put-together furniture for over 2 decades and have learned to exclusively buy Sauder Furniture because of the quality pieces, customer service, and assembling instructions - the best in the market, IMHO. They even provide video. Unfortunately, the Sauder collection I've been purchasing to add to my studio in the last 10 years (Harbor View in Antique White) became discontinued and I needed a lateral file cabinet, I had to hunt for something in the same design genre. This led me to the Bush Furniture line, and I fell in love with this Linen White Oak finish, which is pretty close to what I already own. Upon arrival, I did the usual checking of parts (all good there), laid out all the pieces, sorted all the nails, screws, etc. into little Tupperware containers (my usual), got my tools, and got to work. I was dismayed though, at the less than great assembling instructions. Thank goodness I've done this many times and was able to figure out some of the steps on my own!  Some might not be able to get it so easily if they're not mechanically inclined or have simply not used this type of furniture you put together yourself. The main issue was the drawer "slides" (metal mechanisms that hold the drawers in place) - not easy to follow at all.  I had the entire thing put together except for the last steps of the slides on the drawers and realized I had to take them apart and re-assemble - something I've never had to do. As far as the quality, though, this thing is SOLID. I love the back of it being made from same material as the sides and top - something that Sauder could do better on some of their pieces.  I'm very happy with the result and look. I've already begun using it and one of the features that I really love is that the bottom drawer has a "catch" on the slides that has a satisfying click when you close it, and seems to help keep the whole unit from coming forward on you. I don't plan to load it down  Very satisfied with my purchase - just know that the building process is more laborious and tedious than it needs to be. One MAJOR thing to note, if this matters to you:  The hanging file folders are NOT side-by-side facing forward. That only works for one half  of each drawer, the way this is designed (see photos). That was disappointing. All the designers would've had to do is add about an inch to the "width" of this cabinet to accommodate forward facing file folders on both sides with two dividers in the middle (again, see photos). Final note:  I would recommend that BUSH Furniture create a couple of short videos on how to assemble  the trickier aspects like the metal slides, using the bolts, etc. Assembling furniture isn't always easy for the more difficult steps and would greatly enhance the customer experience. Thanks! Read more Debra Hart Studio 5.0 out of 5 stars While instructions for building it could be better, the product itself is really solid and nice! Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2024 I have been buying put-together furniture for over 2 decades and have learned to exclusively buy Sauder Furniture because of the quality pieces, customer service, and assembling instructions - the best in the market, IMHO. They even provide video. Unfortunately, the Sauder collection I've been purchasing to add to my studio in the last 10 years (Harbor View in Antique White) became discontinued and I needed a lateral file cabinet, I had to hunt for something in the same design genre. This led me to the Bush Furniture line, and I fell in love with this Linen White Oak finish, which is pretty close to what I already own. Upon arrival, I did the usual checking of parts (all good there), laid out all the pieces, sorted all the nails, screws, etc. into little Tupperware containers (my usual), got my tools, and got to work. I was dismayed though, at the less than great assembling instructions. Thank goodness I've done this many times and was able to figure out some of the steps on my own!  Some might not be able to get it so easily if they're not mechanically inclined or have simply not used this type of furniture you put together yourself. The main issue was the drawer "slides" (metal mechanisms that hold the drawers in place) - not easy to follow at all.  I had the entire thing put together except for the last steps of the slides on the drawers and realized I had to take them apart and re-assemble - something I've never had to do. As far as the quality, though, this thing is SOLID. I love the back of it being made from same material as the sides and top - something that Sauder could do better on some of their pieces.  I'm very happy with the result and look. I've already begun using it and one of the features that I really love is that the bottom drawer has a "catch" on the slides that has a satisfying click when you close it, and seems to help keep the whole unit from coming forward on you. I don't plan to load it down  Very satisfied with my purchase - just know that the building process is more laborious and tedious than it needs to be. One MAJOR thing to note, if this matters to you:  The hanging file folders are NOT side-by-side facing forward. That only works for one half  of each drawer, the way this is designed (see photos). That was disappointing. All the designers would've had to do is add about an inch to the "width" of this cabinet to accommodate forward facing file folders on both sides with two dividers in the middle (again, see photos). Final note:  I would recommend that BUSH Furniture create a couple of short videos on how to assemble  the trickier aspects like the metal slides, using the bolts, etc. Assembling furniture isn't always easy for the more difficult steps and would greatly enhance the customer experience. Thanks! Images in this review Helpful Report Jimmy 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice cabinet but takes time to assemble Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023 Color: Shiplap Gray/Pure White Pattern Name: File Cabinet Verified Purchase The directions are fair, there are a lot of parts. I bought two and 1st took 50 minutes to assemble but 2nd took 25. Parts are labeled with  long numbers why not A,B,C and illustrations could be clearer for drawer glide direction and a few other parts. Once assembled the cabinets are solid and don't wobble at all. I didn't install the anti-tip that prevents both drawers being opened at the same time because of the video with the clicking sound but no kids ever come in my office. Drawers line up perfectly with some common sense adjustments if needed during assembly. Read more 2 people found this helpful Helpful Report Starry Nights 4.0 out of 5 stars Does not fit two rows of letter front to back and Dark Color, Very Black not bright Red-ish Cherry Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2021 Color: Bing Cherry Pattern Name: Cabinet Verified Purchase The media could not be loaded. First of all, this is engineered wood, not solid wood. The bottom of the drawers and the back of the cabinet are particle board. For the price, it is pretty enough, and functional. However, you cannot fit two rows of letter size folders front to back - you can have one front to back, with the others sideways (see video). You can move the center rail to accommodate legal size going front to back, and letter sideways. The actual inside dimensions are 22.5 inches long,  12 inches wide and 9.25 inches deep (inside). The drawer depth is less than the front panel depth. When I close the door, the mechanism that prevents both doors from being opened at the same time clicks, and if I stop pushing the cabinet in at that point, the door is flush with the sides, but sticks out at the top and bottom. You give it one more push and it is where it should be located. I tried showing this in the video, and two photos. The rails are plastic. One thing that concerns me is that the front door is attached to the drawer pieces with a plastic part - see photo of inside drawer corner. My father says plastic can be strong. Time will tell. The drawers do come with one stop for each drawer, to prevent them from coming all the way out. The drawers open easily, and the drawer sliders (rails) are all metal. They are greased, so I got some grease on me during assembly. Had to wash my hands several times to prevent grease from getting on the cabinet while I put on the drawer sliders. One pleasant surprise is that the unit comes with one furniture anchor (see photo with orange bag), that has one zip tie and a butterfly (?) bolt. Because it is engineered wood, one of the side front posts already is damaged. I have contacted the manufacturer for a replacement, which was sent quickly. I didn’t use glue where the dowels are placed (the instructions don’t say to use glue); therefore, I was able to take it apart again and replace the damaged front leg without having to remove the back; but I did have to take out both drawers. You must be very careful not to damage the wood while assembling the cabinet. The assembly instructions were pretty clear, and they have about 3 online YouTube videos to watch assembly of the cam and bolts. I am familiar with using this type of connections, so assembly was pretty straight forward. It lacks advice about keeping the slide rails straight, so I used a square (not included), and there is a little room for error here. If you keep the rails square, the drawers are pretty level when done. I used a level (not included) to get the front drawers into alignment- I only had to adjust the bottom drawer by about 1/8 or less inches on one side. You adjust by unscrewing the plastic part (see photo), moving the front panel slightly, and tightening the screws again. As for the color, I am disappointed. There is a photo of the color of the cabinet, but it’s actually darker than the photo shows. It has a lot of black, and is very dark. It’s not the color I wanted. The color I wanted is a more red- ish color. Overall, it’s nice enough for the price, and I will use it. It leaves me wanting a real all solid wood cabinet, one that is a different color - bright red Cherry and one that is longer, so you can have 2 rows of files front to back. From advice I have seen, people recommend that you do not paint engineered wood, because it can’t be sanded. Amazon's Choice in Bookcases by Yoobure 1 sustainability feature Sustainability features This product has sustainability features recognized by trusted certifications. Forestry practices Made with materials from well-managed forests, recycled materials, and/or other controlled wood sources. As certified by The Forest Stewardship Council The Forest Stewardship Council The Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) supports responsible forestry, which is a vital solution to combat climate change. Choosing FSC-certified products –  whether furniture, building materials, paper, rubber, or textiles – helps protect forests, wildlife, clean water and supports the Indigenous Peoples, forest workers and communities who depend on them. Choosing FSC-certified  products can also help to mitigate climate change by supporting responsible management of the world’s forests. For a better  future, choose FSC. Color: Rustic Brown 1 option from $49.99 1 option from $49.99 1 option from $49.99 1 option from $49.99 10 options from $42.20 1 option from $49.99 Purchase options and add-ons Room Type Study Room Number of Shelves 6 Special Feature Waterproof, Durable Product Dimensions 7.8"D x 15"W x 45"H Style Modern Age Range (Description) Adult Finish Type Wood Brand Yoobure Product Care Instructions Wipe with Dry Cloth Size 45"H See more Material Wood Mounting Type Floor Mount Shelf Type Tiered Shelf Shape Rectangular About this item 【Modern Bookshelf Design】The book shelf combines modern design with vintage colors, and it presents a unique personality along with a warm atmosphere that can blend in with most home decor styles. The multifunctional partition design of the book case is perfect for displaying your books, CDs, magazines, video games, manga, decorations, novels, speakers and more. 【Save Space & Decor Room】Yoobure bookshelves dimensions: 44.48"H*15"L*"7.87"W. The corner bookcase has 6 storage areas, each storage area can hold 5–10 books. With its open design and small footprint, this narrow bookshelf is easy to move and organize, making it ideal for corners and small spaces and perfect for use in living rooms, offices and bedrooms. While saving space, this small bookshelf is also a work of art, suitable as a gift for family or friends. 【Sturdy & Durable】The skinny bookshelf is made of high-quality board material, which is not easy to break and has a tough and durable texture. And the tree geometric bookcase is designed with backboard reinforcement, which has strong load-bearing capacity. For added safety and stability, we offer anti tip furniture straps that allow you to secure corner bookshelf to the wall, especially for families with children and pets. 【Easy to Assemble & Clean】The product package includes easy-to-follow instructions, numbered parts, assembly tools and an installation video on the product page, allowing you to quickly and easily assemble this wood bookshelf. This tall bookshelf has a flat and waterproof surface that can be easily cleaned with a damp rag. 【Customer Service】We provide 1 year after-sales service for this book shelf organizer. If you have any questions and suggestions about our large bookshelf during installation and use, please feel free to contact us, our customer service team will always be there for you. We give priority to customers' needs and we'll go on improving to better serve you all. Thank you for supporting Yoobure! NEW FROM YOOBURE BEST SELLERS How did we get our start? Yoobure starts with the idea of offering comforts and utilities to our communities. Since 2016, offers a range of functional home furnishings that are really affordable for families around the world. What makes our products unique? We pour all sincerity to our products. We sell not only goods but reputation, and harvest full trust from customers all these years. Why do we love what we do? Fate makes us get acquainted and trust makes fate endless. We always keep in mind: to make people much happier here! Next page Product Description Before Storage After Storage Previous page Next page Previous page Next page Can this unique bookshelf hold CDs and magazines? The size of the bookshelf is marked in the picture of the product, you can check the size chart first, and then place suitable items according to the size of the bookshelf. How many books can the wooden book shelves hold? The spine bookshelf has 6 storage sections and a bottom storage space, each section can hold 5-10 books. Is there an installation tool provided? What tools do I need to prepare? The package includes easy-to-follow instructions, numbered parts and assembly tools, so you can quickly and easily assemble this tall bookcase. Tips: An electric drill is required to install the anti tip furniture straps. Sustainability features This product has sustainability features recognized by trusted certifications. Forestry practices Made with materials from well-managed forests, recycled materials, and/or other controlled wood sources. As certified by The Forest Stewardship Council The Forest Stewardship Council The Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) supports responsible forestry, which is a vital solution to combat climate change. Choosing FSC-certified products –  whether furniture, building materials, paper, rubber, or textiles – helps protect forests, wildlife, clean water and supports the Indigenous Peoples, forest workers and communities who depend on them. Choosing FSC-certified  products can also help to mitigate climate change by supporting responsible management of the world’s forests. For a better  future, choose FSC. To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. Read more View Image Gallery Amazon Customer 5.0 out of 5 stars Images in this review Reviews with images See all photos Previous page Next page All photos Amazon Customer 5 out of 5 stars Cute bookshelf! I just moved into a new apartment and have limited space and this was perfect to fit in the corner of my living room. I haven't really organized it yet, just threw books on it for this photo. I imagine as I add more books, I'll probably mount it on the wall but for now it works as is. It took me probably an hour and a half to assemble and I only had one hiccup when it came to adding the last back panel. There are videos to assist you online which was nice. All the pieces necessary to assemble were included. This is ideal for limited space and if you want something a bit different than a traditional bookshelf. Read more 2 people found this helpful Helpful Report Freeze Dat! 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2024 Color: Light Blue Verified Purchase This sleeper sofa  is a great space-saving option for small apartments, dorm rooms or home offices. While it performs well as a compact loveseat or ottoman during the day, it easily folds out to a single bed for overnight guests. The light blue upholstery has a modern, clean-lined look that will fit into most decor styles. It also has adjustable backrests and armrests for customizable comfort while seating two. As with many futon-style couch beds, this one is quite firm and not the most cushiony seat. However, for the price and versatility in a tight space, it's difficult to beat. The fold-out mattress is comfortable enough for one person to sleep on. Overall, this 4-in-1 futon couch/ottoman/loveseat  is a practical furniture piece that saves space without compromising functionality. Its transformable design makes it suitable for small living quarters like apartments, dorms or home offices. She writes about sales, deals, and new products trending at Amazon. This year, Amazon Prime Big Deal Days — a.k.a. Amazon Prime Day in October — has millions of impressive discounts across virtually every category. Dyson vacuums, Apple AirPods, Le Creuset cookware, and other customer-favorite products are up to 80 percent off. Don’t miss out on smart TVs, furniture, Amazon Kindles and other devices, fall clothing, and more before Prime Big Deal Days ends on Wednesday, October 9. Anyone can sign up for a free 30-day Prime trial and unlock access to the best prices. People/Alexander Huang Best Prime Day Apple Deals Any Apple devices on your wish list? Shopping Sales & Deals Amazon Prime Day 2024 The 50 Best Amazon Prime Day Deals That Are Just for Prime Members Save on customer favorites from Apple, Le Creuset, and Yankee Candle By Clara McMahon Clara McMahon Clara McMahon is a Shopping Writer for PEOPLE with more than three years of experience in the digital media industry. She covers a variety of home, fashion, and tech products from Amazon, including cordless vacuums, cooling bed sheets, wireless headphones, wedding guest dresses, and more. People Editorial Guidelines Updated on October 8, 2024 06:11AM EDT In This Article View All In This Article Best Deals Overall Tech Deals Home Deals Kitchen Deals Fashion Deals Beauty Deals Photo: People / Alexander Huang / Amazon (6) Attention, Amazon Prime members! Amazon’s October Prime Day , a.k.a. Prime Big Deal Days, just kicked off for its second year in a row, and we spotted impressive deals that are exclusive to Prime members. Amazon’s sale section is overflowing with major markdowns, but only Amazon Prime members can save on Apple AirPods, Yankee Candles, Dyson vacuums, and other popular favorites. If you’re not yet a member, sign up for a 30-day free trial of Amazon Prime to access both extra and exclusive Prime Day deals before the event ends tomorrow, Wednesday, October 9 at 11:59 p.m. PT. Best Amazon Prime Deals Overall Best-Seller: Bissell Little Green Carpet and Upholstery Cleaner , $82 (orig. $124) Popular Pick: Laneige Lip Sleeping Mask , $17 (orig. $24) Apple AirPods Pro 2 , $169 (orig. $249) Yankee Candle Autumn Wreath Scented Candle , $25 (orig. $31) Amazon Fire Stick 4K Streaming Device , $25 (orig. $50) Dyson V8 Cordless Vacuum Cleaner , $349 (orig. $469) Crest 3D Whitestrips Teeth Whitening Kit , $30 (orig. $46) KitchenAid Artisan 3.5-Quart Stand Mixer , $250 (orig. $380) Lego Icons Flower Bouquet Building Set , $48 (orig. $60) Apple AirTags 4-Pack , $80 (orig. $99) Some of the best Prime-exclusive deals we found include Apple AirPods Pro for under $200 and the ever-popular Laneige lip mask that hardly ever goes on sale (take it from us!). We also caught a rare deal on the best-selling Bissell Little Green Carpet Cleaner , which can come in handy if you plan on deep cleaning your home to refresh for fall or ahead of holiday entertaining. Speaking of seasonal essentials, this autumn-scented candle by Yankee Candle is now under $25; light it while you whip up a pumpkin bread batter in your new KitchenAid stand mixer , which is also on sale during Prime Big Deal Days. Shopping Home Products Furniture Amazon’s October Prime Day Is Overflowing with Furniture Deals Starting at $16 Snag couches, patio furniture, coffee tables, and more ahead of the rush By Amy Schulman Amy Schulman Amy Schulman is a Shopping Editor and Strategist for PEOPLE with over seven years of experience in the digital media industry. She covers all the most enticing home and kitchen deals from Amazon, showcasing the likes of robot vacuums, nonstick skillets, cozy bed sheets, discounted furniture, and more. People Editorial Guidelines Updated on October 7, 2024 10:26AM EDT In This Article View All In This Article Furniture Deals Overall Sofa Deals Living Room Furniture Deals Space-Saving Furniture Deals Outlet Furniture Deals Patio Furniture Deals Although Amazon’s October Prime Day doesn’t officially start until tomorrow, there are already tons of deals to score ahead of the two-day sale. That’s right: You can snag must-have items in just about every category before Prime Big Deal Days begins. And if there’s one place you start looking right now, it’s in the furniture department. Shoppers can pick up something for every room in the house — including the patio — such as bed frames, coffee tables, sofas, and TV stands. Plus, discounts go up to a whopping 89 percent off. Shopping Home Products Vacuums The 36 Best Amazon Prime Day Vacuum Deals — Up to 80% Off for Prime Big Deal Days Dyson, Roomba, Shark, and more vacuums start at just $23 By Amy Schulman Amy Schulman Amy Schulman is a Shopping Editor and Strategist for PEOPLE with over seven years of experience in the digital media industry. She covers all the most enticing home and kitchen deals from Amazon, showcasing the likes of robot vacuums, nonstick skillets, cozy bed sheets, discounted furniture, and more. People Editorial Guidelines Published on October 8, 2024 03:30AM EDT In This Article View All In This Article Best Vacuum Deals Overall Best Cordless Vacuum Deals Best Upright Vacuum Deals Best Robot Vacuum Deals Best Handheld Vacuum Deals Photo: People; Amazon (3) Amazon’s October Prime Day 2024 is officially here! Prime Big Deal Days is teeming with massive discounts in the Amazon deals section , including fall fashion, must-see home decor, and furniture. And in the floorcare department, you’ll tap out on some of the best Amazon vacuum deals we’ve seen this season. Shoppers can save up to 80 percent on cordless, handheld, robot, and stick vacuum cleaners, which means you’re guaranteed to find something that’ll help you remove fallen cereal in the kitchen or all that pet dander on the rugs. Plus, several of our favorites from Roomba, Dyson, Shark, and Bissell are on sale, with prices as little as $23. Best Amazon Vacuum Deals Overall Best Seller: iRobot Roomba Vac Robot Vacuum , $170 (orig. $250) 80% Off: Upbooz Handheld Vacuum Cleaner , $50 (orig. $250) Lefant Robot Vacuum Cleaner , $110 with coupon (orig. $200) Dyson V8 Plus Cordless Vacuum , $440 (orig. $470) Shark Pet Cordless Stick Vacuum , $220 (orig. $260) Drecell Portable Car Vacuum , $26 (orig. $30) Shark Lift-Away Upright Vacuum with Powerfins , $230 (orig. $280) These Upgraded AirPods Have Superior Noise Cancellation and Longer Battery Life — And They’re on Sale To make things super easy, we’ve plucked out some of the best Amazon vacuum deals we’re seeing so far, including a top-rated Roomba that’s only $170 and a $250 handheld vacuum that’s been slashed by a whopping $200. More than 2,000 shoppers have picked up the handy device in the past month, and its HEPA filter is designed to trap up to 99.99 percent of dust and other allergens as you work. Not yet a Prime member? Don’t worry: Enroll in a free 30-day trial to unlock even more perks, discounts, and free shipping you can take advantage of during Prime Big Deal Days. Amazon Best Amazon Cordless Vacuum Deals Shoppers can choose from a slew of cordless vacuum deals, including some of our top picks from Dyson, Bissell, Dirt Devil, and Eureka. Pick up the Shark Corded Stick Vacuum while it’s only $160. Plus, don’t miss out on grabbing the least expensive stick vacuum we found while it’s a steal at just $30. Dyson V11 Original Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner Amazon $570 $470 at Amazon Dyson vacuums rarely go on sale, so when one does, it’s a sign to add it to your cart. The popular V11 model has 60 minutes of run time, comes with four accessories, and has an LCD screen that highlights power modes. Plus, you can transition it into a handheld vacuum, allowing you to clean upholstery, car interiors, and more. Amazon’s October Prime Day Has Lightweight Jackets to Wear Now and Heavy Coats to Wear Later — Starting at $14 Dirt Devil Power Express Lite Stick Vacuum Amazon $55 $50 at Amazon This lightweight stick vacuum weighs just 4.4 pounds, making it a breeze to carry from room to room. It has a powered brush roll and an easy-to-empty dirt cup that makes for quick clean-up. One five-star reviewer explained that it’s “perfect for [an] elderly person who has problems lifting and pushing heavy vacuums.” Bissell Featherweight Stick Lightweight Vacuum , $30 (orig. $34) Dyson V11 Original Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner , $470 (orig. $570) Shark Rocket Deluxe Pro Corded Stick Vacuum , $160 (orig. $250) Dirt Devil Power Express Lite Stick Vacuum , $50 (orig. $55) Sowtech Corded Stick Vacuum Cleaner , $60 with coupon (orig. $70) Eureka RapidClean Pro Cordless Cleaner , $135 (orig. $150) Fieety Cordless Vacuum Cleaner , $150 (orig. $200) Fabuletta Cordless Vacuum Cleaner , $130 with coupon (orig. $260) Amazon Best Amazon Upright Vacuum Deals There are upright vacuum deals galore during October Prime Day, including options from Dyson, Hoover, and Kenmore. These vacuums are great for heavy-duty cleaning, often equipped with high suction power. We especially like the Shark NV360 Navigator Lift-Away Deluxe Upright Vacuum (and it’s only $160!), along with this Bissell MultiClean Vacuum that’s ideal for pet owners. Hoover MaxLife Pro Pet Upright Vacuum Cleaner Amazon $210 $160 at Amazon Weighing in at 17 pounds, this Hoover upright vacuum cleaner can be used on all surfaces, including carpets and hardwood floors. The swivel steering allows you to easily navigate around obstacles like bulky pieces of furniture, and the XL dirt cup means you don’t have to empty it as often. Dyson Ball Animal 2 Upright Vacuum Cleaner Amazon $400 $300 at Amazon Detangling hair from the roller brush can simply be a thing of the past thanks to the Dyson Ball Animal 2 Upright Vacuum Cleaner. The vacuum automatically removes wrapped hair from the brush as you work — making your life a whole lot easier. Set these smart devices on schedules and let them get to work, diving under bed frames and squeezing into corners you may have otherwise missed. iRobot Roomba Vac Robot Vacuum Cleaner Amazon $250 $170 at Amazon This Roomba sucks up dirt and dust with ease thanks to the three-stage cleaning system. Plus, it has an array of sensors that prevent it from accidentally falling down a flight of stairs or crashing into objects. It’s packed with four cleaning modes, a long running time of up to 100 minutes, and a Bluetooth connected app that gives you the option to set cleaning schedules. Its 3-inch height allows it to easily glide under furniture, and the specifically designed suction inlet makes it a match for nearly every floor surface. Shopping Home Products Vacuums This Bissell Cordless Vacuum ‘Goes Toe to Toe’ with Dyson Models, and It’s Only $120 Now “The suction picks up cat litter and cat food like a champ!” By Genevieve Cepeda Genevieve Cepeda Genevieve Cepeda is a staff shopping writer for PEOPLE. She was formerly a PEOPLE beauty and style intern and wrote about style, entertainment, and arts for four years at Northwestern University. People Editorial Guidelines Published on October 8, 2024 05:00AM EDT Photo: Amazon I recently made the upgrade to a cordless stick vacuum , and I couldn’t recommend the switch enough. A cordless vacuum makes it easier to clean up quick messes, maneuver around furniture, and transport the vacuum around the house. Now’s the perfect time to upgrade, while Amazon is full of vacuum deals for Prime Big Deal Days . This Bissell CleanView XR is a great on-sale option, and reviewers rave about its high-end performance, even comparing it to Dyson vacuums . It’s lightweight, gets in hard-to-reach spots, and handles pet hair with ease. Bissell CleanView XR Cordless Vacuum Amazon $199 $120 at Amazon The Bissell punches well above its weight, delivering a similar suction power to that of more expensive models. “I dumped my Dyson,” one reviewer wrote , adding that the Bissell is “easy to empty [and] easy to charge,” and “not heavy or clunky.” The 36 Best Amazon Prime Day Vacuum Deals — Up to 80% Off for Prime Big Deal Days “This goes toe to toe with my Dyson and it’s less expensive,” another shopper said . The vacuum is equipped with LED headlights that illuminate dirt and debris in its path, which is a game changer for hardwood floors. The brushroll prevents hair from getting wrapped around it, according to the brand, which makes for easy cleanup in homes with pets. “This vacuum cleans very, very well,” a third reviewer wrote . “The suction picks up cat litter and cat food like a champ! I’ve got six fosters right now and two cats of my own and I think cleaning is going to get a whole lot easier for me.” Shoppers also say the vacuum works well on carpets, and they report that the vacuum easily transitions between different flooring types. The removable battery allows you to store the vacuum and charge the battery separately between cleaning sessions. Standard mode affords you 35 minutes of cleaning time, while the high-suction turbo mode will last for up to 10 minutes on a single charge. The 50 Best Deals Hiding in Amazon’s Customer Most-Loved Section During October Prime Day — Prices Start at $7 It comes with crevice and brush attachments to suck dirt out of couch cracks, hard-to-reach corners, and upholstered furniture. It also transitions into a portable hand vacuum with an extendable wand, so it can pick up cobwebs and dust that are usually difficult to clean. Don’t miss out on the Bissell CleanView XR Cordless Vacuum while it’s on sale. Read on for more vacuums that are discounted during Amazon Prime Big Deal Days. People Editorial Guidelines Published on October 7, 2024 11:00AM EDT Photo: Amazon Vacuuming seems like one of those never-ending chores, so it’s helpful to have a convenient vacuum like this Shark IZ363HT Cordless Vacuum at the ready. Shark IZ363HT Cordless Vacuum Amazon $350 $230 at Amazon LIVE: 65 Amazon October Prime Day Deals on the Best Products We've Tested — from $4 The Shark cordless vacuum has powerful suction that you can use on carpets as well as hard floors. It’ll run for up to 50 minutes on a full charge in standard mode and its LED lights shine bright to illuminate hidden dirt and debris you may have otherwise missed. Once the dust cup is full, simply press a button to empty it into the trash. The self-cleaning brushroll has flexible silicone fins rather than bristles. Translation: You won’t have to worry about hair and pet fur getting tangled up and slowing down the device. The cordless stick vacuum also comes with a HEPA filter to reduce dust and allergens as you clean. Convert it into a handheld vacuum when you want to remove dirt from furniture and between couch cushions, or extend the wand to get into hard-to-reach spaces like tall window sills and ceiling fans. It also comes with an upholstery brush, dust brush, and crevice tool. Plus, it only weighs about 7 pounds, making it a lightweight choice that you can tote from room to room. They finished their review by writing: “Dyson owners — you won’t regret switching to Shark.” “It slurps up dog hair like crazy and doesn't get tangled in the brushroller,” another customer added . “It doesn't scatter any dirt like other brands. The suction power is so strong, nothing escapes it.” If you’ve been meaning to upgrade to a stick vacuum that can handle pet fur and other debris, now’s the time. Shopping Home Products My Mom Still Uses Her 5+ Year-Old Pyrex Food Storage Containers, so I’m Eyeing This Similar Set Plus it’s on sale for Amazon Prime members By Maggie Horton Maggie Horton Maggie Horton is a shopping writer for PEOPLE with a background in print journalism and digital media. Currently, she writes about sales and hot new items in the home space, including celebrity decor collaborations and deep discounts on trusted brands like Dyson and Vitamix. People Editorial Guidelines Published on October 7, 2024 06:30AM EDT Photo: People; Amazon; Maggie Horton Pyrex has been my family’s go-to brand for glassware for generations, so I’m eyeing a new set of food storage containers for myself during Prime Big Deal Days . My mom and grandma swear by the brand’s durable glass and secure lids to store, freeze, and reheat leftovers and transport food without leaking. This different seven-piece Pyrex set comes with round, rectangular, and square containers in a variety of sizes, all with matching snap lids. Shop the top-rated pick while it’s on sale exclusively for Prime members for less than $6 apiece. Pyrex 7-Piece Glass Food Storage Containers, $38 with Prime Amazon $45 $38 at Amazon Yankee Candles Are Quietly on Sale at Amazon Prime Big Deal Days, and Prices Start at $17 I can attest to Pyrex’s stain-resistant qualities, as our glassware is still just as clear as the day it arrived, including my mom’s which is more than five years old. My mom appreciates that she can throw her lids and containers in the top or bottom rack of the dishwasher, saving valuable top-rack space. My mom explains that the locking lids provide extra peace of mind because she knows they are secure when she hears the tabs click into place on each side. Maggie Horton The set I’m buying is also designed to resist absorbing stains, odors, and flavors from food, so whatever it holds will stay fresh. Plus, the lids are made from BPA-free plastic, so they’re safe to use in the microwave, and every part of the containers can go in the dishwasher. The set comes with dry-erase labels on each lid, too, so you can label them with dates and descriptors. Similar Pyrex glassware we tried didn’t splatter soup in the microwave, either. One Amazon shopper dubbed the Pyrex glass storage vessels the “perfect containers for leftovers,” adding that they “keep food super fresh” and are “easy to clean and durable.” Another shopper noted that “the versatility of being able to freeze, dishwash, and use in the oven” makes them “super useful” for everyday use. Join me in taking advantage of this deal before Prime Big Deal Days end on October 9. Shopping Sales & Deals Amazon Prime Day 2024 The 110+ Best Amazon Prime Day 2024 Deals We Found for October Big Deal Days Including Apple, Dyson, Sony, and more By Isabel Garcia Isabel Garcia Isabel Garcia is a Senior Shopping Writer for PEOPLE with more than four years of experience in the magazine industry. She writes about sales, deals, and new products trending at Amazon. People Editorial Guidelines Updated on October 8, 2024 06:30AM EDT In This Article View All In This Article Deals Overall Apple Deals Home Deals Furniture Deals Clothing Deals Vacuum Deals TV Deals Kindle and Device Deals Kitchen Deals Laptop Deals Beauty Deals Deals Under $25 Best Prime Day Shoes Deals Naturalizer Women Bebe Slip On Loafer Dr. Scholl's Shoes Time Off Lace Up Sneaker More of Our Favorite Amazon Shoe Deals Photo: People / Alex Huang Updated 06:30AM EDT October 8, 2024 LIVE: Best Amazon Prime Day Deals Shop the best October Prime Day deals, sourced in real time by our shopping experts. Loloi Magnolia Home by Joanna Gaines Sinclair Pebble Taupe Area Rug , $235 (orig. $304) Bissell CrossWave Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner , $132 (orig. $230) Instant Pot Pro Slow Pressure Cooker , $100 (orig. $170)ho The countdown is over: Amazon Prime Big Deal Days just kicked off! This year, Amazon Prime Big Deal Days — a.k.a. Amazon Prime Day in October — has millions of impressive discounts across virtually every category. Dyson vacuums, Apple AirPods, Le Creuset cookware, and other customer-favorite products are up to 80 percent off. Don’t miss out on smart TVs, furniture, Amazon Kindles and other devices, fall clothing, and more before Prime Big Deal Days ends on Wednesday, October 9. People/Alexander Huang Best Amazon Prime Day Deals Overall Sellout Risk: Dyson V8 Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner $349 (orig. $470) Lowest Price Ever: Apple AirPods Pro 2 , $169 (orig. $249) 65k Five-Star Ratings: Bissell Little Green Portable Carpet Cleaner , $82 (orig. $124) Reader Favorite: Laneige Lip Sleeping Mask , $17 (orig. $24) Beckham Hotel Collection Bed Pillows , $48 with coupon (orig. $61) Apple AirTag Four-Pack , $80 (orig. $99) 79% Off : Yesayce Electric Spin Scrubber , $39 with coupon (orig. $190) Lodge Pre-Seasoned Cast Iron Skillet , $20 (orig. $34) Crest 3D Whitestrips Professional Effects Teeth Whitening Kit , $30 (orig. $46) Amazon Smart Plug , $13 (orig. $25) New deals will drop as frequently as every five minutes during the two-day shopping event — and we’re here to help you navigate them all by updating this page with the very best ones. Right now, grab thee Apple AirPods Pro 2 the Bissell Little Green Portable Carpet Cleaner while they're both marked down to their cheapest prices for during October Prime Day. Prime members have access to every Prime Big Deal Days deal, plus other perks like fast and free shipping. Not a subscriber yet? Anyone can sign up for a free 30-day Prime trial and unlock access to the best prices. People/Alexander Huang Best Prime Day Apple Deals Any Apple devices on your wish list? October Prime Day is an ideal time to invest in Apple Watches, Apple AirPods, iPads, Macbooks, and more big-ticket gadgets. You can also score savings on handy tech accessories that thousands of shoppers swear by, including the AirTag and the MagSafe wireless charger . Apple AirPods Pro (Second Generation) Amazon $249 $170 at Amazon More than 10,000 Amazon shoppers have added these wireless earbuds to their cart in the past month — and for good reason. One reviewer noted that the “sound quality is fabulous,” while another wrote that they’re the “best headphones for iPhone users.” Apple AirPods Max Headphones Amazon $549 $395 at Amazon The “Rolls-Royce of headphones,” as dubbed by one customer , Apple’s over-ear headphones have transparency and noise-canceling modes that are easy to switch between. Apple Watch SE (2nd Generation) Amazon $249 $170 at Amazon We’ve spotted this accessory on the wrists of Jennifer Garner, Oprah, and Gayle King. The little smartwatch is packed with a slew of safety features — it can notify people when you arrive at your destination and detect if you fall or crash. Plus, it’s equipped to track workouts and monitor your heart rate. Apple AirTag Amazon $29 $25 at Amazon Apple AirTags let you breathe a little easier while you travel. The clever, compact device easily slips into suitcases, backpacks, and other on-the-go essentials, allowing you to keep track of your personal belongings from just about anywhere. Apple iPad Mini Amazon $499 $350 at Amazon This popular tablet has a clear display and a compact, lightweight design that makes it “incredibly portable,” according to shoppers. Use it to stream shows, read e-books, take notes, and more. Apple Pencil (Second Generation) Amazon $129 $90 at Amazon Join the thousands of Amazon shoppers who have already bought the Apple Pencil this month. The handy accessory connects to iPads and makes it easy to take notes, sketch, and sign your signature. Apple MagSafe Wireless Charger Amazon $39 $31 at Amazon More than 57,000 Amazon shoppers have given this fast and reliable wireless charger a perfect five-star rating. Apple Macbook Air Laptop (2024) Amazon $1,099 $849 at Amazon Prime Day is a great opportunity to save on investment purchases, like a faster laptop. This 2024 Macbook is under half an inch thin and has a battery life of up to 18 hours. Other standout features include a 1080-pixel HD camera and three microphones for crystal-clear communication. Apple Watch Series 9 Amazon $399 $299 at Amazon The Series 9 is a top-selling smartwatch on Amazon. With its brighter display and faster voice response than previous Apple Watch models, we can see why. Apple iPad (10th Generation) Amazon $449 $299 at Amazon With over 15,000 five-star ratings on Amazon, this iPad is loved by students, professionals, parents, readers, and TV watchers alike. One reviewer called it a “versatile powerhouse for work and play,” adding that “it strikes the perfect balance between performance, design, and usability.” People/Alexander Huang Best Prime Day Home Deals Top-selling cleaning gadgets, storage organizers, and decor from Hoover, Yankee Candle, and other favorites are marked down for Prime Big Deal Days. Stay warm and cozy through winter with Amazon’s most popular comforter and this compact space heater from Dreo. Then snap up this Hoover carpet cleaner to deep clean stains and embedded dirt trapped between fibers. Hoover PowerScrub Deluxe Carpet Cleaner Amazon $231 $130 at Amazon This Hoover carpet cleaner uses a combination of strong suction and heated scrubbing to lift stains off of floors with quick-dry results. One reviewer raved about its ability to snatch the “ancient dirt” from their 20-year-old unwashed carpets. Bedsure All-Season Comforter Amazon $43 $19 at Amazon This Amazon best-selling down comforter has a breathable polyester fiber filling and a soft microfiber shell that one user described as “buttery soft.” As the name implies, you can keep it on your bed year-round. Fab Totes Fabric Storage Bags Amazon $42 $15 at Amazon Thousands of shoppers have packed away their off-season clothes and extra bedding in these storage bags. They come in a set of six and keep excess moisture away. A clear panel allows you to see exactly what’s inside for easy organization. Dreo Portable Space Heater Amazon $40 $36 at Amazon December you will thank October you for snapping up this portable space heater during Prime Big Deal Days. You won’t be the only one: Over 10,000 shoppers have bought the heater in the past month. Serta Quilted Soft Waterproof Mattress Pad Protector Amazon $30 $22 at Amazon Mattresses are expensive, and a mattress pad protector helps keep it in good condition for years to come. This one is machine-washable, waterproof, hypoallergenic, and, notably, a PEOPLE Tested winner . Aroeve Air Purifier, $95 with Prime and coupon Amazon $120 $80 at Amazon When we tested air purifiers , we liked how this device had a color-changing display to indicate the room’s air quality. And on auto mode, it sped up automatically when it detected pollution. Yankee Candle Sage and Citrus Large Glass Candle Amazon $31 $17 at Amazon With up to 150 hours of burn time, this large Yankee Candle jar has a refreshing fragrance that one Amazon shopper called “light, bright, and clean.” LuxClub Microfiber Sheet Set Amazon $57 $34 at Amazon These popular bed sheets are made from a mix of microfiber and elastic that feels “lightweight,” “luxurious,” and “soft to the touch,” according to reviews . “If you're ready to upgrade from sleeping on sandpaper to sleeping on a cloud, LuxClub's got you covered,” one shopper shared. PurSteam Steam Mop Cleaner Amazon $100 $59 at Amazon Get your home in tip-top shape for hosting season with this multi-use steam tool. Requiring just water, it’s a chemical-free way to mop floors, clean carpets, deep clean grout, and refresh upholstery. Flexzilla Heavy Duty Garden Hose Amazon $55 $48 at Amazon More than 14,000 Amazon shoppers have given this garden hose a five-star rating, and it’s the best flexible option we’ve tested in our labs. We like how the silicone handles make it easy to grip and attach to a spigot. It’s available in lengths up to 100 feet. In the market for space-maximizing living room furniture? Consider the Yaheetech Lift-Top Coffee Table , which doubles as a desk. It has a shelf at the bottom for open storage, plus a hidden compartment beneath the lift-top surface for discreet storage. Reviewers agree that the multifunctional table is “sturdy” and “easy to put together.” Vari Essential Hazel Wood Electric Standing Desk Amazon $350 $298 at Amazon We tested this easy-to-assemble electric standing desk, which has programmable preset buttons and operates quietly. Martha Stewart Taytum Swivel Task Chair Amazon $220 $125 at Amazon Upgrade your home office setup with this office chair from Martha Stewart’s gorgeous home line . It’s upholstered in faux leather and has brass accents, plus it swivels 360 degrees. Simple Houseware 3-Tier Shoe Rack Amazon $28 $16 at Amazon More than 74,500 customers have given this minimalist shoe rack a five-star rating thanks to its “sturdy” design that houses up to 16 pairs of shoes. Whether you want to stay cozy at home or while on the go, throw on this knit lounge set that consists of an oversized sweater with drop sleeves and matching pants. Shoppers have worn the “super comfortable” and “flattering” outfit on travel days, around the house, and postpartum. Hanes EcoSmart Fleece Hoodie Sweatshirt Amazon $22 $14 at Amazon Dive into sweater weather with us and grab this comfy fleece sweatshirt while it’s on sale for October Prime Day. Warner's Easy Does It Smoothing Wireless Bra Amazon $42 $18 at Amazon This is one of the best-selling bras in Amazon’s everyday bra category . Over 3,000 shoppers have purchased one of these smoothing bras in the past month. The Gym People High-Waisted Leggings Amazon $30 $20 at Amazon We just found your next go-to pair of workout leggings. They’ve been dubbed “comfortable” and “stretchy” by plenty of Amazon shoppers. Ororo Heated Jacket Amazon $200 $112 at Amazon Why put up with goosebumps when you can just wear the best heated jacket money can buy ? The battery pack lasts for up to 10 hours and can also be used to charge your phone in a pinch. Mangopop Square Neck Long Sleeve Bodysuit Amazon $36 $17 at Amazon After testing 30 bodysuits on different body types , this one proved to be the best bodysuit at Amazon. We love that it’s stretchy and comfortable, and also it comes in 20 different colors. The Mangopop bodysuit makes a great alternative to a long-sleeve tee since it will stay smoothly tucked all day. More of Our Favorite Amazon Clothing Deals Pink Queen 2-Piece Sweater Knit Set , $31 with coupon (orig. $48) Lillusory Oversized Batwing Sweater , $30 (orig. $60) Lee Ultra Lux Comfort Flex Motion Bootcut Jean , $32 (orig. $43) Anrabess Knit Long Cardigan , $34 (orig. $70) Levi's Women's Wedgie Straight Jeans , $36 (orig. $80) Brooks Glycerin 20 Running Shoe , $95 (orig. $160) People/Alexander Huang Best Prime Day Vacuum Deals When it comes to keeping a clean home, a reliable vacuum is a must-have. Fortunately, upright, handheld, robot, and cordless vacuums from Dyson, Shark, and iRobot Roomba are on major sale during Prime Big Deal Days. There are also deals on multifunctional  gadgets, like a cordless vacuum that converts to handheld vacuum and a robot vacuum that doubles as a mop . Dyson V11 Original Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner Amazon $560 $400 at Amazon This Dyson vacuum allows you to swiftly snap up messes on both hard floors and carpet without being tethered to a wire. Plus, its impressively strong suction detangles hair, dust, and other debris as you clean to prevent clogs. Shark Navigator NV352 Upright Vacuum Cleaner Amazon $200 $120 at Amazon Tackle hair, dirt, and debris with this popular upright Shark vacuum that’s equipped with strong suction and a wide brush head. ThisWorx Car Vacuum Cleaner Amazon $38 $34 at Amazon This compact handheld vacuum is ideal for cleaning dog fur, sand, and other debris out of cars. It comes with multiple attachments that make it easy to sweep floor mats and reach into cracks and crevices. “Powerful enough to keep those back car seats free from food and candy mess,” one reviewer wrote . Dyson V15 Detect Plus Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner Amazon $750 $700 at Amazon This cordless Dyson vacuum maximizes cleaning with an hour-long runtime and intelligent features. Smart technology helps capture more dust and debris, while a green headlight illuminates hidden particles. Plus, it converts to a handheld vacuum for harder-to-reach spots. Shark IX141 Pet Cordless Stick Vacuum with XL Dust Cup Amazon $260 $200 at Amazon As the owner of a 16-year-old dog, PEOPLE shopping director Laura Gurfein is familiar with shedding and debris buildup around her home. So she was quite impressed with this vacuum’s ability to suck up so much dirt and pet hair that her rugs look visibly brighter afterwards. Narwal Freo Robot Vacuum Mop Amazon $900 $550 at Amazon Two appliances in one, this robot vacuum-mop combo uses sensors to automatically clean surfaces and can even target walls and baseboards. Whether you want a compact screen for a guest room or a big screen for the ultimate home theater setup, there are plenty of deals on TVs of different sizes. Don’t miss out on this 75-inch TCL Smart TV while it’s on sale for the first time ever during Prime Big Deal Days. The sleek TV has clear resolution and easy navigation, so you can cheer on your football team or rewatch your favorite Halloween movies. Insignia F20 Series HD Fire TV 24-Inch Smart Television Amazon $80 $60 at Amazon This smart TV is a compact screen ideal for small living rooms or bedrooms. The 1080 HD display isn’t too shabby either, as proven by the 17,000+ five-star ratings it’s received from customers. Fire TV Omni Series 4K UHD 43-Inch Smart Television Amazon $400 $300 at Amazon Go hands-free with the Amazon Fire TV that has built-in microphones that allow you to power on the TV and control content using your voice. The screen offers a vibrant display that supports 4K Ultra HD entertainment for a movie theater-like experience. This device allows you to stream over 300,000 free movies and TV episodes, plus grants access to millions more with subscriptions from supported streaming services like Netflix, Prime Video, and Peacock. It has more than 100,000 five-star ratings from Amazon shoppers. Eero High-Speed WiFi Router Amazon $90 $70 at Amazon Kick your home WiFi into gear with this router deal. The easy-to-use device covers up to 1,500 square feet and supports speeds up to 900 megabits per second. Ring Video Doorbell Amazon $100 $60 at Amazon With this video doorbell, you can see and hear whoever approaches your door using your smartphone, tablet, computer, or other compatible equipment. Fire HD 10 Tablet Amazon $140 $75 at Amazon The Amazon Fire tablet is ready to go wherever you go. It has a 10.1-inch HD display, a 13-hour battery life, and up to 64 GB of storage. You can use it for browsing, reading, streaming, gaming, and working. It even has a front-facing camera so that you can video chat on the go. More of Our Favorite Amazon Device Deals Kindle Scribe , $255 (orig. $340) All-new Amazon Echo Spot , $45 (orig. $80) Amazon Echo Show 5 , $50 (orig. $90) People/Alexander Huang Best Kitchen Deals Le Creuset, Rubbermaid, Ninja, KitchenAid, and more popular brands are on sale during October Prime Day. It doesn’t matter if you’re in the market for small kitchen appliances, versatile cookware, or storage containers — there are impressive deals to shop on all of them. Le Creuset Classic Cast Iron Skillet Amazon $120 $155 at Amazon This cast iron skillet from the classic French brand is super easy to clean thanks to a dishwasher-safe enamel coating. “I use it every morning to make eggs, and it doesn’t stick,” one reviewer wrote . Henckels 15-Piece Knife Block Set Amazon $345 $140 at Amazon Sure, you could get a cheap set of knives to save some money now, but chances are you’d need to come back for another sooner than you think. Take advantage of this October Prime Day deal on the last set of knives you may ever buy. Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee Espresso Maker Amazon $179 $110 at Amazon This espresso machine that “makes a better cup than the best barista,” according to one shopper , is worth the investment. It makes single and double shot espresso and drip coffee with the push of a button and heats up in just 25 seconds. KitchenAid Artisan Series 5-Quart Stand Mixer Amazon $450 $350 at Amazon The iconic KitchenAid stand mixer makes easy work of whisking, kneading, whipping, and mixing with its 10 speeds, handy attachments, and large stainless mixing bowl. Rubbermaid Produce Saver Containers Amazon $40 $30 at Amazon What sets these apart from other food storage containers are the proprietary lids that regulate airflow to help keep contents fresh for longer. Their textured bases help with this, too. Crock-Pot Large 8-Quart Programmable Slow Cooker Amazon $100 $60 at Amazon When we compared the best slow cookers , this 8-quart Crock-Pot was the best for entertaining large groups. It has a spacious chamber, doesn’t get too hot, and works via three simple settings, ideal for multiple cooks of varying expertise. Just make sure you have plenty of storage space. Ninja Professional Plus Blender Amazon $120 $90 at Amazon Prepare for holiday hosting with this popular blender from Ninja. Our Place Always Pan 2.0 Amazon $150 $94 at Amazon Oprah, Cameron Diaz, and our writer have all sworn by the original Always Pan for easy everyday cooking. Farberware Countertop Microwave, $90 with Prime Amazon $130 $90 at Amazon One of five microwaves we recommend , this sleek microwave has a control panel with six preset buttons and a child safety lock. Plus, its compact size won’t take up too much countertop space. Amazon’s October Prime Day started on Tuesday, October 8 at 3 a.m. ET, 12 a.m. PT. The two-day shopping event runs through Wednesday, October 9. Shopping Home Products The 10 Best Deals We Found on Trending Home and Kitchen Items at Amazon This Week — Starting at Just $6 Score up to 54 percent off air fryers, air purifiers, bath mats, and more By Toni Sutton Toni Sutton Toni Sutton is a shopping writer for PEOPLE with over a decade of experience in the digital media industry. She covers some of the best deals on robotic vacuums, kitchen gadgets and tools, cookware, furniture, decor, and more from beloved brands like Shark, Dyson, and Lodge. People Editorial Guidelines Published on October 2, 2024 12:30PM EDT Photo: People / Amazon (2) This week Amazon shoppers are scooping up all kinds of home and kitchen essentials like plush bed sheets , time-saving air fryers, and more. So how do we actually know what people are buying? Amazon’s Movers and Shakers chart , which is a hub that features the site’s trending products and gets updated frequently. If you’re looking to refresh some of your most used items and stock up on seasonal finds, then check out these affordable and reviewer-approved products. Rather than sorting through the pages yourself, we rounded up the best home and kitchen deals, and prices start at just $6. Trending Home and Kitchen Deals 54% Off: KitchenAid Silicone Oven Mitt Set , $16 with Prime (orig. $35) Best-Seller: Kitchellence 4-in-1 Knife Sharpener , $9 (orig. $14) Under $10: Andaxin Digital Meat Thermometer , $6 (orig. $9) Sonoro Kate 4-Piece Bed Sheet Set , $26 (orig. $39) Levoit Top-Fill Humidifier , $29 (orig. $40) Utopia Towels 8-Piece Bath Towel Set , $29 with Prime (orig. $42) Chefman Electric Kettle , $20 with Prime (orig. $28) Olanly Microfiber Bath Mat , $14 (orig. $19) Dreo Space Heater , $34 with Prime (orig. $40) Ninja 4-Quart Air Fryer , $80 (orig. $130) The 6 Best Deep Fryers of 2024, According to Our Tests Levoit Top-Fill Humidifier Amazon $40 $29 at Amazon If your skin or home is drier than usual, then check out this Levoit humidifier that releases a cool fine mist into the air for added hydration. You can customize the mist level, which can be sprayed in multiple directions. It runs for up to 25 hours thanks to its 2.5-liter water basin, so it can be left on all day. The machine has racked up thousands of perfect ratings, and more than 30,000 shoppers picked one up in the past month. “On the highest [setting] it really does provide great humidity in this dry climate,” one person commented . “It's small but mighty and doesn't take up too much space.” Sonoro Kate 4-Piece Bed Sheet Set Amazon $39 $26 at Amazon Refresh bedding at home with these bed sheets that “feel even better than hotel sheets,” according to one reviewer . It comes with two pillowcases, one flat sheet, and one fitted sheet, which has deep pockets and stretches over mattresses as thick as 16 inches. Each piece is made from soft double-brushed microfiber, so they will keep you warm through winter. The 12 Best Comforters and Duvet Inserts We Tested for Any Type of Sleeper Dreo Space Heater, $34 with Prime Amazon $40 $34 at Amazon Easily warm up a chilly room with this Dreo space heater that can reach up to 95 degrees Fahrenheit. One user says the device heats up their TV room in “just a few minutes.” The heater is made of flame-retardant materials and shuts off if it overheats or falls over. Its compact size also means it can be placed on a desk or a nightstand without taking up too much space.
